Just find a quiet space in your house and give it a few minutes each day. After a whole you will be surprised how it starts to ‚Äúreset‚Äù you and your ability to stop your mind from wandering to places you don‚Äôt want it to. Thank you Kaiser and thank you Calm!

title: Can‚Äôt wait for new programs *not* narrated by Tamara
review:
I bought the lifetime version of the app after discovering their 30-day program on how to meditate with Jeff. It‚Äôs a fantastic program! I highly recommend it!
Only then did I realize that 90% of the other programs are narrated by Tamara, whose smiling while talking makes it impossible (for me) to listen to. She comes across as phony.  I know, I know, meditating should enable me to ignore this, but I don‚Äôt know yet how to do it, and learning from Tamara is just not happening. 
Please, Calm, continue developing your offering, and get other narrators because right now your value proposition is much lower than your competitors‚Äô.

title: It has helped my recovery.
review:
I have been using this app to help teach mindfulness while going through therapy for some mental issue. It has reduce my anxiety or at least help me shorten the attack by a lot. I‚Äôm not out of the woods but this has help teach me how to see bluer skies.
I did decide since I now have used it daily for almost a year to go with the lifetime membership. I use the meditation, the music, the stories, and my favorite the quick relief hybrid of breath exercises with body scans.

title: Amazingly effective for sleep
review:
This app has been a savior to me this year. The sleep stories help me fall asleep soundly and stay asleep. This has made a huge improvement in my ability to rest during the night and my alertness and outlook during the day. I had previously tried Headspace but it didn‚Äôt work for me at all; for whatever reason Calm does the trick. 

My only request is to increase the diversity of narrators, and enable some of the sorting features other reviewers have suggested. 

There is just one narrator (Tamara Levitt) who has an extremely affected way of speaking that I find off-putting. She is unfortunately the same person who narrates most of the meditations which has kept me from exploring that part of the app. 

Aside from that, I am a big fan of Calm and think it‚Äôs well worth a subscription.

title: Used to love this app a few years ago, just redownloaded...
review:
I used to love this app. It relaxed me, calmed my nerves, and let me breathe. And I was able to do a lot of that stuff because it was free. 

Well, I just re-downloaded this app, expecting it to maybe be the same. I open the app, and almost EVERYTHING that is not for beginners is LOCKED. Almost all of the music is locked, all the stories, everything. I haven‚Äôt been this disappointed in an app in a long time. 

Please make more stuff on your app free, it‚Äôd be greatly appreciated. And I know a lot of those funds go to your app, but come on, everything being locked?? That‚Äôs ridiculous. Be better.

title: So worth it!!
review: Ive been using Calm for a couple of years now and also recommend it to my health coaching clients and friends.  There is a meditation for everything! Their sleep stories are also great.  I also love the mood check in and gratitude journal built Into the app, and the reflections on the daily calm meditations.  Really gives you the opportunity to expand your mindfulness practice.  There have been down days when this app has helped me tremendously.  Thank you Calm!

title: I can‚Äôt even tell you
review: Okay, straight up, I don‚Äôt even use the meditation. All I use is the sleep stuff. GAME CHANGER. I don‚Äôt even know how it‚Äôs possible but ever since I put on the Ocean Waves and keep it playing all night as I sleep, I SLEEP THROUGH THE NIGHT! How is that even possible? I used to wake up countless times. I don‚Äôt even get up to go to the bathroom anymore I sleep straight through until morning. We are all built differently but for me this absolutely changed my life. Thank you Calm!!

title: This app is OUTSTANDING ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüåüüåüüåüüòçüòç
review: It takes me ages to fall asleep but now I can go to sleep earlier! I love it! Also I fall asleep in 3 mins! It‚Äôs great! This app is recommended for everyone who needs to fall asleep faster! I love this app so much! I don‚Äôt know how much to thank the creators of this app! Know wonder this game is called calm ! It‚Äôs a stress reliever! Anyone who knows or seen this app  should get it! It does not cost money ! And I have not played it in a while but I think there is NO adds! It‚Äôs amazing ! Get this app now!

title: Great app but needs a repeat option
review: We bought the premium subscription as our whole family loves to listen to meditation to fall asleep. We were very disappointed to find out that there is no way to repeat a meditation or story. We had previously been using Moshi for my daughter (which has a repeat option). Sometimes it takes her a long time to fall asleep and the repeat feature is necessary. Otherwise we love the app. Please add this feature as it would be a great customer enhancement.

title: Search Feature/Support Feature
review:
A search feature would be nice. While skimming through stories, music, etc., it would be nice to find one you‚Äôve seen without scanning through them all again. I realize making an item a favorite is a way to collect them for oneself. If search is there, please tell me where to find it.

A support feature to report problems, ask questions, etc. would also be great. Again, if a support link is there, please tell me where.

Thank you.

title: Almost perfect
review: I am really enjoying this app in every way but one. I always fall asleep before the end of a story which is great but sometimes I awake in a few hours and want to just hold on to my sleep by finishing the story. However there is no easy way to complete or replay that story. I have to come out of where I am in the app and go through the list of stories again.  This makes me now fully awake and sometimes I don‚Äôt find the story I want.  That is frustrating at a time when I want to be relaxed.

title: Please consider soundscape mixing!
review: This app has been a god send during these anxious times, and I am sleeping better than ever. I would really love to see a greater variety of soundscape sounds on the app, adding to those such as the city streets and heavy rain. It would also be great if we could make our own soundscape mixes from the different sounds on offer, blending different noises and different levels to our own preferences. This was a key feature of the old app Ambiance, which no longer exists, but would be most welcome here!

title: Missing features
review: Calm is ok.  There are tons of locked content and this app isn‚Äôt worth $70 a year for premium content. Super expensive. There are other apps that let you alter sounds, for example, if you listen to the thunderstorm sound but want more thunder and wind sounds and less lightning - there‚Äôs a sound app that lets you do that. Calm does not have this feature.  Other apps let you increase volume for certain sounds within the sound. Louder thunder, as an example. Those apps are more versatile to a person‚Äôs taste in sounds. Call doesn‚Äôt do this. It‚Äôs an uninstall for me.

title: PLEASE RESPOND. THANK YOU
review: Yes hello , this app is amazing don‚Äôt get me wrong but i have a few questions. Just a few days before ,the songs and soundscapes were available and I could listen to them but now all of a sudden I can‚Äôt listen to them because they are all locked and I can only listen to the songs I downloaded. I‚Äôve had this app for years and this has never happened before. Do I need to pay for the subscription? Was there an error? Please respond. Edit: now I can‚Äôt even access my downloaded songs! It‚Äôs empty; it says I didn‚Äôt download any but I just listened to the downloaded songs earlier today! What is wrong? Please respond

title: I thought the point of meditation was to not force things
review: Calm recently locked the 5 and 10 minute timed meditation which previously was part of the free version offering. I had a paid subscription but never used the full app so I went back to the free app to save some money. Calm could: 1. Become a paid app and only have a limited free trial 2. Provide a tiered plans so people can pay for what they use or 3. Introduce random limits to shame people into paying for the app. In return I could: 1. Pay for the app even though I don‚Äôt use most of the features 2. Work around the random, arbitrary limits and keep using the app or 3. Delete the app and move on. Looks like we both choose option 3.

title: Listen every day
review: I would like the daily calm to have different narrators or at least a choice. I do not think I will continue next year unless I can hear another person after 365 days.  It is a wonderful app but I will search for another wonderful app if needed.  I have no particular problem with the narrator but variety in voice for daily listens seem an important way to encourage consistency.   Loving kindness and hopeful improvement and no mean spirit intended.

title: Exceptional
review: I began using this app at the urging of a nutritional health coach when I was diagnosed with an auto immune disease. I have never been great at managing stress! The guided meditations help me so much! I found meditating to be overwhelming and as though I had to do it ‚Äúright. Calm makes it easy and gives you bite sized chunks of mindfulness. Even my children use this app at night with the sleep stories, they alternate between the same two stories every night! The subscription is worth every penny!

title: A little less set up and more meditation
review: It takes too long for the meditations to begin. Too much talking not much breathing and relaxing. I appreciate the thought that many may not have any background in meditation. But, maybe there should be a beginners to meditation. Two minutes introductions in an 11 minute meditation is far longer than necessary. Sit, close your eyes, inhale, exhale. .... I‚Äôm torn if I should bother to buy after my free 7 day trial. I do find there to be advantages to this app. But, not when it comes to the guided meditations. Which isn‚Äôt that the main point of this app?

title: The best app ever created
review: To echo what so many have said, this app has changed my life in just a short month. After doing the free trial and trying some other meditation apps, I found myself always coming back to Calm and decided it was definitely worth the money. Meditating was doctor recommended for me, but it is helped my mental and emotional health just as much  as my physical health and I‚Äôm so thankful to have an app that can help me on the road to recovery. Cannot day enough good things!

title: Being Read To..
review: As a child I grew up without a television. We were a large farming family in the upper Midwest. Rather than fight with us to do our chores or homework my parents opted to not have a TV. Instead my Mother read series of books to us (excellent reader) before bedtime with popcorn and homemade grape juice. It was my favorite thing we did as a family. It relaxed us and helped settle us down for the night just like the readings and soothing sounds of rain on this Calm App. Thank you..

title: Best app in these trying times
review:
I love this app. I lost my husband, uncle and mother all in the last 4 months. This app has helped me to sleep and get me through some tough days.   Keep up the great work. 
One suggestion I have is I‚Äôve missed updating my daily moods and would
like to be able to go back and add a mood and a little description for that day. I haven‚Äôt been able to figure out how to do that so I‚Äôm thinking the app doesn‚Äôt have that as an option.

title: More Narrators- Please
review: As a yearly paid subscriber it gets hard to want to do the meditations with only Tamara Levitt as the narrator. I personally do not find peace or calm in her voice. I get it‚Äôs her app etc. however if she wants to retain customers on a year to year basis *choice* is a necessary way to win people over. More voices, all genders/binaries and tones are needed to truly reach people. I can‚Äôt see justification in paying for this again when I can‚Äôt focus for ten minutes because her voice doesn‚Äôt resonate with me. It‚Äôs not hard to fix this guys, just a suggestion.

title: Expensive, but worth it.
review: I have really bad insomnia and this app helps me  wind down and fall asleep- although I don‚Äôt use bedtime stories to fall asleep- I use other sessions like dealing with anxiety and coping topics.. I bought this app last year and used it 120 times. I didn‚Äôt renew it because it was so expensive, but I decided that since i used it so much, it would be worth it.. I recommend listening to the free stuff and then take the plunge and buy it if it resonates with you.

title: Just do it
review: Wow .. just wow. 3 days in and this is completely transformative .. I was curious about meditation and head about this from TWIST. I‚Äôm so glad I did this. As a pretty intense smoker and occasional drinker, I feel like all my material wants are dissolving and I‚Äôm finally waking up . I crave nothing more than the next mediation session, and the complete feeling of relaxation I get when I open my eyes. Literally like an amazing spa treatment and enhanced well being all mixed up into powerful and enlightening audio sessions .

title: Great Tool
review:
This is a wonderful app overall. I‚Äôve watched it develop over time from its foundation with Tamara Levitt to the diverse app it is today.

The app is as valuable as the time you put into it, therefore it is worth the price of you actually use it. I‚Äôve used it to build sleep habits, to forgive people when upset with them, to calm down from anxiety attacks, to fall asleep, and more. They have a good music library if you want to use it for massage therapy or other relaxing activities.

title: Amazing!
review:
I'm asleep in minutes! Meditations are great! Reliefs anxiety! Best app!
This app really helps me fall asleep! I recommend 100%! 
One thing though! The app is a little slow, which is fine, maybe it's just my iPad but if you know how to, please fix this! 

Ok this app is amazing! Sleep stories ALWAYS make me fall asleep! I have tried other apps, but this app is the one that gets me to fall asleep. I mainly do the sleep stories, but I've tried the mediation too and there great too! I love your music! I also love the daily check in! Best app ever!

Updated feedback:
I just thought of something, I don't know if you have this, but if you don't could you add the option to make playlists of your favorite calm stories, music, and meditations. You could have playlists of your favorite music that makes you fall asleep!

title: Amazing First Impression, Continued Satifaction
review:
I was hesitant to get another meditation/mental health app but there was an offer for a year free so I tried it. I am not disappointed! This app is easy to navigate and very resourceful. 

My favorite part are the sound scapes to fall asleep to. I‚Äôve used other apps and this one excels in comparison. The app does not crash and the sessions are quickly loaded without any errors or sudden closures of the app. I am 100% happier with this app. Thank you calm for making me calmer üòÇüòÖ

title: Premium membership required
review: Cool in theory. Saw an ad on Instagram so downloaded the app excited to try it out. Oh wait, literally everything on here is locked and requires the premium membership. 2 sleep stories are free, absolutely none of the music is free, and you can do a few of the mediations. Everything else is locked. Another reviewer said they went online to see what was free and there‚Äôs ‚Äútons of content,‚Äù but I haven‚Äôt found any available. There was a momentary glitch that made it seem like a lot of the music was free, but when I went back there, all the ones I had access to a minute prior were now locked.

title: Like it, but lacking a ‚Äúplaylist‚Äù functionality for longer lasting sleep stories
review:
I really like it fore many reasons.
Thing is that for sleepless ppl like me, ~30 mins sessions aren‚Äôt nearly enough to get me to sleep. So I usually need to reactivate it after, which wakes me up. 
Also, would be great to sequence a few sessions, one after the other as a playlist (including the background nature sounds to keep throughout the night). 
The lack of the ^^ result in lack of resolution to the problem i turned to this app for. üò¥

title: Lovely app. Would be also nice to have ...
review: Hi! First of all, Thanks for the great app! I have a feature in my mind that you might consider adding to the app. It would be absolutely lovely to have an option of adding an ‚Äúopen-ended meditation‚Äù starting right after a ‚Äúdaily Calm‚Äù so it would look like a customized playlist. In such a scenario, the user could get an advice and then continue implementing it in practice without interruption of meditation for switching between ‚Äúrecords.‚Äù Cheers!

title: Great BUT.....
review: This app is really cool and it does what it says it does BUT the ad I saw for this on a game was ‚Äúmix the colors‚Äù with calming music and there‚Äôs nothing like that in the app. Also it‚Äôs like all or nothing if you want to purchase it. You can‚Äôt pay for a month. It‚Äôs one year and especially now, people don‚Äôt have $70 to spend on an app like this. There‚Äôs not a lot of free content which I can u sweat and but again if they had a monthly payment option I‚Äôd be more apt to pay for it. Please do a ‚Äúmix the colors‚Äù that was really calming.

title: Once my mom introduced me, I LOVED it. I did a review with my middle bar lol
review: This app is so amazing and so amazing I can download this game and play Xbox with all the updates. This app I just got it for Xbox it was amazing fun app to download it is so amazing omg omg was the morning I just got off the road to get the car to get it now and you should get the Xbox I got you a lot and you don‚Äôt need me. Ok that was weird ty middle bar, this app is great for stress relief, insomnia, and plenty more! I recommend this app to all of you, it‚Äôs AMAZING!!!!

title: Terrible and here‚Äôs why
review: Me personally I hate it I hate the idea of profiting off other people‚Äôs stress and inability to calm themselves down  like honestly some people have no were else to go and they see an add for third app and think they have a safe haven only to be pressured in to buying the calm package because celebrities do it like that‚Äôs not how it should be mental health is a huge issue and no one should want to profit off it because at the end of the day people get misled by your adds and then are stuck having to hope the sound of crickets will help bring them back because all they can do is that while they tap emojis to express how they felt for the day great concept terrible people

title: Fantastic
review: I thought I was going to cancel this before the free trial ran out. I couldn‚Äôt see how it could be worth $70. Holy crap I was wrong. This app is amazing. I love the sleep stories and the master classes. The guided meditation exercises and guided stretches are also great. I‚Äôve been sleepy horribly for the last few years. After having this app for just a few days I‚Äôm falling asleep easier and I‚Äôm able to use quick stress relief exercises during the day to help my mood.

title: Great but..
review: To start off, this app is amazing. It helps me sleep at night, helps me take my mind off of all kinds of stress and relax. The problem is that the stuff is so limited that I‚Äôve basically already just listened to all of the books. I mean, there are only like 3! I looked at the price for premium and it is way to expensive for me! I know for sure I wouldn‚Äôt be able to pay $70 dollars a year for that! I am too young to get a job still and I know my parents wouldn‚Äôt pay. At least make it where there is more of a variety of things without premium.

title: Life changing
review:
Even if you think your life is perfect, you will benefit from meditation.  This is a truly amazing app that I‚Äôve been using multiple times a day. It offers a lot more than just mediation such as stretching guides and sleep stories. I'm offering to purchase the subscription for my employees and am recommending to all of my friends and family.

Why not try the seven-day free trial and see for yourself.  People need to get off prescriptions and start meditating. Good luck üôèüèª‚úåüèº

title: Wonderful Meditation Teachers
review: I have been using the Calm app for more than five years. Teaching, masterclasses, music, bedtime sleep stories, and focused meditations have helped me through the years and has become a part of my morning daily ritual. The Daily Trip with Jeff Warren has been a balm in many ways to help me grow through lifes challenges. The app is well organized and it is easy to access all the different choices. Highly recommend this app.

title: I usually don‚Äôt write reviews
review:
But I can assuredly say that because of this app my life has markedly improved in sleep, motivation, focus, and happiness. Been using for a week. 
I love the utility and variability of the kinds of features for meditating, sleeping, lowering anxiety, etc. The stories are excellent with lovely voices and takes. Cillian Murphy on a train in Ireland. Tamika Brown in an apple orchard. The ability to sleep  the phone while using the app is probably it‚Äôs best feature. 
5 out of 5 (so far)

title: Calm
review: My experience with calm has been amazing. It‚Äôs great for people like insomniacs and students with busy lives and nights filled with stress and worry. It has helped me a night owl to want to go to sleep and even sleep better!! I love calm but the one thing I really wish was better is the voices and music, there all amazing but sometimes to loud! so loud that I can‚Äôt get it to a point where it‚Äôs just right maybe I just have sensitive ears? Over all calm is a great experience and you should definitely give it a Try.ü§ó‚ò∫Ô∏èüëçüëç‚ù§Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏èüß∏

title: Awesome! üåàü§©
review: This app is actually better than I expected, and also far better than any calming apps I have had so far. The meditation and confidence series are so relaxing and help me release stress and it makes me actually want to close my eyes and think. I hate having my eyes closed but this made it comfortable. My only complaint is that you should definitely make more things free so that I don‚Äôt need a subscription to the app.  Thank you for reading! üòå

title: Locked-Calm Premium
review: So I love this app, it would really help with stress and be very fun, IF everything was unlocked. Almost every day Calm advertises for Calm Premium, and every day I decline it. I am not in desperate need of this app in my life, so I don‚Äôt need to pay lots of money every month for extra festivities and whatnot. What I‚Äôm trying to get at is: everything is locked. I don‚Äôt want to spend my money on Calm Premium, but I want some good stuff. If I had anxiety problems or was really stressed, I might buy Premium. I only have mild sleep problems, key word mild. But most of the sleep sounds are locked. In conclusion, Calm, I‚Äôm just sayin, throw some stuff in for the minors.

title: Calm
review: I  have completed 300 sessions with 196 of them in consecutive meditation sessions.  Following each session I have given all of them very high ratings.  Also, I have have shared some, and don‚Äôt know what the results were. I do know I have benefited from the participation, too numerous to share here. I am a better person and I have gained personal benefits which have been good for me.  If you don‚Äôt give calm a chance you will never know but I recommend DO GIVE IT A CHANCE TO IMPROVE YOUR LIFE!

title: Emotional Revolution
review: I am a FAMILY Physician and am always trying to find ways to help people calm themselves.  This app is lovely- I just wish the subscription was less.   I especially like the feelings identification aspect.  I feel the greatest way to help people calm is to understand the emotions they are feeling at the time, understand why they have them, and then understand how those feelings/emotions effect their own behavior and the world around them. Anything that helps this is a part of what I call ‚Äú Our emotional evolution.‚Äù

title: The Best App EVA!
review:
Dear People Who are interested,
This app is crazy awesome! It's so calming. I listen to books, and listen to sessions (some are free), and my favorite mood journal! It's beautiful books like 'Floating With The Florida Manatees' and 'Luna's Lullaby' and much more. I love doing daily sessions and being able to show my friends how much it does. It changes my heart and makes me feel confident. When I feel weak and scared I just go on calm and start some sessions and listen to some nice books. 
Sincerely,
SmartReviews

title: Best Sleep Medicine Yet!
review: I have been a poor sleeper forever. I have had trouble falling asleep and staying asleep for decades.  After just two nights at the trial in this app, I have fallen asleep in less than 10 minutes of just the body check preview!!!   I am so impressed and extremely thankful for this app. My healthcare provider recommended this and I was skeptical. I‚Äôm a believer now. This is a true blessing. I can‚Äôt wait to put my EarPods in tonight and shut out the world.

title: A lifesaver
review: I‚Äôve only been using this app for a week and the difference is noticeable from day one! I knew I needed to do something when I noticed more anxiety & poor quality of sleep particularly these past 2 months.  The first day I did a guided meditation I slept like a baby, like a deep sleep and woke up rested.  The morning practice also helps me start the day in the right mood, with the right perspective.  I would give it a 6 star rating if there was one! ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Recenter / ground / slow down / connect to your sensations
review:
Great app to encourage more stillness in your day - where the majority is used to always moving on to the next. 
Slowly I am seeing myself become less reactive and more responsive from the skills I am building with this app. The skills are open ended and presented in ‚Äòfood for thought‚Äô format. 
I love the ‚Äúradiating energy‚Äù background sound.  
I look forward to contributing more streaks in my own profile.

title: This app brings me peace. 9/10
review: I still haven‚Äôt gone through everything that is offered on here but I have the premium and I don‚Äôt regret paying for it at all. This literally brings me peace and reassurance that I will be okay and the deep sleep released always puts me to sleep. I i‚Äôve everything about it the only thing I ask is to hear black voices on here for sleep stories and other exercises. Also would like for Jhene Aiko to be featured here in some way.

title: I love the app, just needs more narrators
review: I love this app, it has so many different inspiring things to listen to.  My only quibble with it is the meditations. I want to start my day off with this app, but I cannot do Tamara‚Äôs voice. She is probably a lovely person, and I hate to say it,  but I just cannot do it.  Her voice sounds rehearsed, and she curls more with her ‚Äúr‚Äùs than anyone I‚Äôve heard, it just makes me wince.  It just doesn‚Äôt sound like she‚Äôs speaking naturally.  I‚Äôd love if John Armstrong did more narrating in the meditations.  That being said, I love the lessons by other people, and the music is very soothing.

title: The app is okay I‚Äôll admit but..
review: So the app yes it‚Äôs okay I‚Äôm not complaining it‚Äôs just there is one thing that I‚Äôll admit I feel like when I want to sleep I somehow fall to stories you know? But then I would have to pay and I don‚Äôt feel like paying money to my parents as I‚Äôm toward a goal in life with my money... its just I feel like the free ones aren‚Äôt enough for me you know.. but overall I‚Äôm not telling u to make the stories free..and I‚Äôm not complaining and nor is this a bad review...and overall it‚Äôs an okay app good day or night!

title: I   AM HOME, Peacefully Safe and Calm üôè‚ù§Ô∏èüôè
review:
Thank You CALM ‚ù§Ô∏è I am in my second year with this beautiful and perfect CALM App!!! I can‚Äôt live without you! I am sooo grateful for you Tamara. I listen to you and meditate nightly before sleep üò¥ and then I spray my pillow with my CALM Sleep Mistü§©ü•∞ Then I listen to one of your beautiful sleep stories üòá
In the morning I journal in my CALM book üìñ 
I adore all of the Masterclasses  and all of the content in my CALM App. 
    Thank You sooo much for my beautiful life now that you are truly beautiful and I am blessed üôèüôè‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüôè

title: Meditating with Calm  JUST DO IT
review:
Meditation with Calm is the best applications for me as I have always had an interest in Meditation but never learned a good way to learn the how.

Now I use CALM every day and have had a lot of success with their program and recommend it for everyone. 

CALM focuses on just the right issues for me in the retiring years of my life. RIGHT NOW is a very trying time for everyone and Meditation using sound techniques is an answer to many of our life‚Äôs issues.

title: 100mph to 25mph
review: I consciously felt like I physically could not relax. I was constantly quick to anger and frustration. It was really challenging in relationships and managing stress. This app really helped me calm down and slow my mind and body. I actually started being able to breathe better when I‚Äôm finding it challenging from anxiety. I approach situations more calmly. This has been a daily practice for me, and it has really brought me back to how I‚Äôve always envisioned myself.

title: Relaxing!
review: I really like how many options this app has for breathing exercises. I used one of the breathing exercises when I was feeling stressed and overwhelmed and it really helped me calm down. I also really like how many options there are to help with anxiety,m. I just wish that with as many options there are, more were free so I can a fuller experience. I can see though how this would essentially be relaxation training as a form of treatment for anxiety disorders.

title: 6 Stars
review:
Is a 6 Star rating possible? Calm has literally changed my life and my sleep habits significantly. I rely on this app like a family member. Listening to Tamara‚Äôs sleep relaxation and breathing sessions put me to sleep in less than 15 minutes. Nothing and I mean NOTHING has been able to do that! I don‚Äôt know how I‚Äôd cope if this app were to stop existing. 

Only thing I wished the app had was a search feature. That‚Äôs the only thing I can find fault with in this app.

title: Exceptional
review:
This app has help to calm my lambic system several times. Whenever I have anxiety, feel sad, or just looking for a moment for myself this app helps me to come back to balance. 

Remember balance... it is not perfection, it is more the fact you are conscious about your feelings and look for an answer of why you feel them. Let them come with compaction and from there, start going through them to reach peacefulness.

title: Great app, please mix up the narrators!
review:
I started meditating to preserve a shred of sanity in the pandemic. I purchased Calm Premium and am really happy with it; I love the daily and special meditations, the reminders, the music options, really just a fantastic program for anyone who wants to become less reactive and more accepting.
My only suggestion is to mix up the narrators. Tamara Levitt does an excellent job, but at a certain point it‚Äôs like a radio station with one host. I wouldn‚Äôt change anything about her, but I‚Äôd love some other options.

title: Life-Changing if....
review: ... you practice mindfulness daily with this app. I am constantly impressed with the app‚Äôs updates. The new Reflections feature that pops up after you‚Äôve listened to the Daily Calm is like having a little black book for your personal mental wellness. Every Daily Calm feels like Tamara is touching-base with you. She and the rest of the folks at Daily Calm have been my North Star in my mental health journey. Oh and Yes! The subscription is worth every cent.

title: Not impressed
review: So is there anything that‚Äôs free on this app that‚Äôs actually worth it or are the creators just going to force us to purchase the upgrade to experience anything at all? To be honest I think it‚Äôs pretty selfish of them to care more about forcing you to upgrade and pay them to experience anything than to give you the app you downloaded. At least they could just make the download itself require a purchase instead of us wasting our time to create an account and then realize everything is locked. For an app based on caring for mental and physical health they sure don‚Äôt seem to care unless you‚Äôre making your subscription payments.

title: Wonderful complete app
review: I don't know what I would do without it. I used it in the free mode for sometime before subscribing. I have always struggled with sleep, mindfulness, etc. My husband passed away recently and my mind needed a rest.  I found myself worrying that I wouldn't sleep which could cause more anxiety and depression. I am determined to keep moving forward and I believe this app is a part of the puzzle. It's a simple app to use and has much to offer.

title: Helping let go
review: My birthday is today and I‚Äôm trying to morning mediate everything morning. Tamara‚Äôs voice is soothing and easy to listen to and I‚Äôve mediated now everyday for the last week. This going to become one of the easiest ways to let go of unwanted feelings, habits, energy, all things I hold inside. Thank you for creating such a wonderful app. It helps me sleep at night and takes my mind out of my thoughts and into just being.

title: Three years user
review: I started using this three years ago when my Mom passed away, it helped me to cope but I wasn‚Äôt consistent. I have always enjoyed the different categories and availability. Recently, I wanted to get deeper into meditation and finding overall peace. That‚Äôs when I noticed the masterclasses which is a HUGE plus for me. I‚Äôm on the ‚ÄúHow to meditate‚Äù 30 days masterclass and loving it. The app has always work really well for me on Apple with no glitches.

title: Exactly what I needed!
review: I had been introduced to this app some years ago at a time when I didn‚Äôt take meditation seriously. Growing up in the Caribbean, the idea of mediation and therapy was almost considered taboo, especially amongst men in the culture. I participated foolishly in these hyper-masculinities only to be torn down emotionally because some compounded trauma. With limited options, I turned to therapy and to Calm. It has been woven into my routine since. It is my go-to when recalibration is needed!

title: Premium is WORTH IT
review: I started Calm with a one month free trial. I loved the sessions so much I bought a year subscription. The fact is, I would rather pay $50/year for this than $300 for one therapy session. The full app has many different areas, including meditation, sleep, stress, self-care, etc. the narrators have soothing voices, and the content is excellent. This app is a no brainer for someone looking to enhance their mental health. It has been so effective for me and highly recommend.

title: Need other voice options
review:
The app is good for what it does.
When you complete a ‚Äòseries‚Äô it doesn‚Äôt save where you were before, so u have to kind of scroll through and remember what was next. This is irritating. The navigation is decent, but needs a revamp to make it more seamless for the user.

The hardest thing to literally listen to, is the voice. While there are some options for an alternate voice, most are just one voice. If this were fixed along with the navigation, I would give the app 5 stars. Will not renew membership.

title: I was terrified
review: I had to get a 45 minute MRI recently and was terrified.  Someone suggested this app to help me overcome my anxiety and fear. Listening to the confidence in Lebron James voice and his talks really helped me focus...take a deep breath, put on blinders and shut out the noise. Excellent strategy when going into an MRI. Jeff Warren‚Äôs talks taught me how to Meditate and take control of my emotions and prepare my mind for the task at hand. The imagery and sounds made  this a great app for overcoming my anxiety and staying calm in what in was a terrifying situation.

title: Jeff Warren is a game changer for meditation
review: His How to Meditate & The Daily Trip are completely different than traditional approaches to meditation.  He makes it easy, relatable and most importantly, he keeps it real. Everyone can meditate and make it work and make a difference in their own lives.  His meditations are soul food for mental health.I also find the sleep stories helpful when I‚Äôm having trouble getting to sleep.  They work for me.  Completely worth the yearly fee.

title: Awesome for Everyone!
review: I‚Äôve tried many of the meditation apps and Calm is definitely my favorite! Super easy to use and calming interface. They have a great variety of meditations for different moods and settings, which I have found incredibly valuable. I love the ‚ÄúDaily Calm/Trip‚Äù series. Great 10 minute daily meditations with a different focus everyday, I always learn something new! I would definitely recommend this app for anyone interested in meditation.

title: Single purchases?
review: Honestly, it's an amazing app and I adore it but can't afford to go premium at the moment. When I did have it, the app did wonders for my mental help and I'd eagerly recommend it to everyone. The only thing I'd suggest to the developers is to perhaps allow people to buy a single story or meditation. I have 2 favorite stories that would put me right to sleep every night and would love to be able to just have those rather than paying monthly for every available thing.

title: Works to improve insomnia
review: I haven‚Äôt given every feature a try, but the sleep options are wonderful. If I wake up, which previously wold have kept me up for hours, I refrain from reading news or social media and instead go to this app. It‚Äôs a game changer. I am amazed at how quickly I can fall back to sleep. Note that I have small children that wake me up frequently and this will work multiple times in one night.

title: Used to like it
review: Like other users I used to enjoy this app.  It is used as part of a program for my work place benefits.  We can use the app to get points but now this one, along with Headspace, (these are the only ones that work with my benefits) charge for almost all of the meditations.  The cost of this app compared to the points I get for my insurance make it not worth it to pay for.  I‚Äôm really disappointed as it was nice to use for some quiet calm time and especially for sleep.  Maybe if it was cheaper it would be more worth my while.  ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Love the app, but I have one suggestion
review:
I use this app every night, I do a mediation
 and listen to a sleep story which puts me to sleep every time. It would be an even better experience if I could filter/sort the sleep stories by length, by narrator,  if they are new, etc. Sometimes if I‚Äôm feeling restless I want the longest sleep story possible. Keep up the good work, Tamara and crew!

Updating my review to beg again for a way to filter sleep stories. Really don‚Äôt care for the UX because it‚Äôs hard to tell what‚Äôs new. Let me sort/filter by how new sleep story is and how long they are.

title: Hooked
review: I went from closing the pop up for a good year to trying the ap. I wish I had done it sooner. I am a chef/owner of restaurant in the time of Covid. Sleep and mindfulness went away in March of 2020. In the two short weeks that I have been using Calm I have slept for more than 6 hours each night, and woke feeling rested. I love the meditations, and haven‚Äôt been able to get through one story with out dozing off. Surrender to Calm. You will not regret it.

title: Life changing
review:
This program is wonderful. I‚Äôve been plagued with sleep problems my entire life and this program has helped so much. I use it almost daily for its sleep content and have recently started the stress program and meditation exercises. It is such a help with my sleep. 
I now have a life membership and have no regrets. I began with the free program, which gives you enough to sample the program, then moved up to membership.

title: Helped me in the hospital.
review: I had been using the Calm app to help me fall asleep on those nights when my mind was racing. But this app saved me when I was recovering from surgery. In the hospital when I was in so much pain after surgery and could not get comfortable I would listen to calm and I could feel my body start to relax. I will always be thankful I had this app to help me through some tough post surgery weeks and nights.

title: My first time
review: Something told me not to ignore calm asking me how I was feeling.  Today was a better day than most so I put in content.  I decided to try 7 days of happiness.  So I put it on my Harmon Kardon Bluetooth and hopped in the shower.  I turned the lights off and grabbed a more calm light from my room to make it semi dark.  Best shower as I listened on how to practice gratitude and what I‚Äôm grateful for!!!  Calm is a winner!  It can be life changing as I have never felt this calm or happy ever before in my life!

title: Tamara Levitt
review:
Tamara Levitt is an Expert in communicating with the unconscious and the collective conscious, and in training our physiology to go Zen. She is a professional who has trekked the long journey and knows how to guide others to inner peace. Spiritually, Tamara is an Angel, she has the soul of someone like Prairie Johnson. Along with Brit Marling, she‚Äôs an Original Angel who can show us how to live in the new century. I‚Äôm a clinical psychologist and I have all my clients listening to her in the evening. 

Oh yea, the other teachers are great. This is so worth the investment. 
David

title: Great app to help calm anxiety
review: I suffer from anxiety and have recently been getting panic attacks during this pandemic .. my doctor recommended this app and I have been committed to it everyday.. meditation was something I never thought I would try out, but here I am and I love it. It really does relax me and I hope it does the same for anyone else who is willing to give it a try. For anyone suffering with anxiety, we‚Äôre in this together we have the power to control it

This app is good and can really help you fall asleep but there are soooo many thing in there that cost money. I downloaded it and I couldn‚Äôt do much.  Don‚Äôt get me wrong, what was free was good but it wasn‚Äôt much.  There are a ton of really cool looking stories and other stuff but it all cost money.  And I get it, they are trying to make more money for the company, but it‚Äôs too much and there isn‚Äôt enough free thing to do.  Basically, my only problem with the app is it‚Äôs free variety is very small.  Besides that, it is pretty nice and can help you (especially if you got money).

title: Way too expensive
review: I deal with a lot of anxiety, low self esteem and stress, especially during a pandemic, so I need something to help me. I like the breathing exercises but practically anything else is premium and cost money. I don‚Äôt want to have to spend money just so I can relax and relieve anxiety. Please offer more free features so It can be more available to more people. It‚Äôs so unfortunate that everything has to cost an excessive amount of money especially during a time of economic hardship when people are unable to pay to take a couple minutes to relax because they don‚Äôt have a job due to COVID. Make it more free please.

title: Don't want to pay
review: I don't want to have to pay $70 a year for me to be able to do things on there. I wanted to listen to music but there wasn't any that were free. If you could make it where there are some things that are free that would be great. Also for the one of the meditation activities you have on there, only one was unlocked. I was looking forward to doing it but I couldn't. I'm hoping that you could put more free stuff on there for the people who don't want to pay.

title: A Better Life
review: Every aspect of this app was created to help each of us learn to be kind to ourselves resulting in us being kind in the world. It is my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù app for many reasons. I use it more often than any other app (even my calendar).  It brings me peace and calm which is the life I chose to lead. I invested in Calm‚Äôs people for a lifetime as I want them to enjoy their work and selfishly so that I can continue to benefit from the gifts they offer all of us. Peace to all.

title: Focus
review: I am so proud of myself! I have had this app on my phone for a long time. I am usually too busy or distracted to make it through a single meditation. I did it! 11 minutes went by so fast! I am excited about using this Calm as part of my daily routine! I‚Äôm going to share with a couple of friends that will benefit also. The app was originally suggested to me by my primary doctor. Probably 5 years ago. It takes what it takes!

title: In-app Purchase Stress
review: This app is all about meditation and getting stress out of our minds, but this app can also bring a little stress back to us with in-app purchases. We need to buy a premium version for Calm just to listen and go through premium meditation. When it asks you to buy it, it cost money (obviously) so we have to put all our info. into this app just to buy a pass. That is very stressful. It is also more stressful when you already bought it but you never use it.

title: Actually helps
review: I‚Äôve tried headspace before and it was okay but I think the British accents were a little annoying... I feel that calm has better people leading the meditation and a better program in general.  Also, Calm keeps introducing celebrity speakers for the guided meditation.  It‚Äôs pretty cool.  They also have a bunch of good soundscapes and relaxing music.  I really love this app. I did the one week trial and decided to pay for the year before the trial even ended.

title: Hope to finally hear a sleep story...
review:
But I seem never to do that. Here's the thing: if I go to bed realizing I won't get enough sleep, I tend to lie there and stew over work stuff. When I launch a sleep story, it removes all the responsibility of work. It's like a real bedtime story, and you don't MEAN to fall asleep, of course.
I have been trying to listen to a description of a great library for at least 3 nights now. I can't do it, no matter how much I try.

title: It a rip off you have to pay!!!!!!!
review: First off why make an app free when you download it and then spam me with 30 month trial only 7.99 a month. App makers like this are scammers only trynna make money and get you to download. It‚Äôs impossible to find a actually free app that doesn‚Äôt spam you to pay money. I am going to tell all of my friends to give this app a 1 star hence all you want is my money. Btw I would feel less cheated if you had to pay off the bat instead of being a free app and realing me in then making me create an email account then answer 20 questions to just be asked pay a monthly subcrition........... ridiculous :((((((((((

title: It‚Äôs Better
review: I previously wrote a review about how Calm kept glitching out. I have a new phone, and that might contribute to it. They also might of fixed it. But, having the subscription - even not having it - the amount of content that is available to you is crazy. Every DAY there is something new and I am never bored with the app. They also have mediations and sleep stories narrated by a variety of celebrities. So overall, I love Calm.

title: State of Relaxation
review:
After using the Calm app for for four months, my mind senses when I need to relax and my body responds. My should relax, my mind gets quiet, and I automatically concentrate on my breath. 

I feel myself desiring to focus only on the present instead of dwelling on the past or trying to figure out the future. 

Love the variety of ways that I can meditate and the messages that available.  The reminders are very helpful throughout the day.

title: First review ever for an app, excellent
review: I wasn‚Äôt too big of a fan of the yearly fee but I figured I would try it for the trial week and see how it went. I was not disappointed. I tried Headspace (which was nice) but a bit too cartoonish for me. Then I tried calm and I must say, it is worth every penny. I use it for med school anxiety and to help me sleep soundly at night. Honestly, I have never reviewed an app before, I thought it was a waste of time, but this one is incredible.

title: This is great but could be even better!
review: I really wish they would allow custom playlists, and also Mark which videos you have already played.  I have been using the Favorites button to just heart any ones I‚Äôve watched.. for instance I want to rewatch a meditation series and continue where I left off the day before..  how do easily I do that? Also, I swear I had a favorite train meditation but it‚Äôs not there anymore?  Could be a better way to search videos for author narrator or title?

title: Fantastic üòéüëçüèª
review:
I really like the 7 days of calming anxiety 
It‚Äôs been helpful.  I feel more relaxed and will listen to it everyday.  I actually listen to 3 or more in a row. I am already in the meditative state at that point, so it‚Äôs good to just keep going.  I will try more soon.  It‚Äôs not just for relaxation but it can change beliefs, perspective, reactions etc so I do feel if I keep it up, it may just change my life.  I already do feel a little change and I just started.  
Personal preference. I like to listen to John Armstrong‚Äôs voice. They give you the option.  
I hope they have more meditations in the future with his voice as an option.  
The meditations and content are very effective and powerful. 
I will subscribe for 1 year when the 1 week free trial is up.  It‚Äôs worth it to me

title: I will CALMLY delete this app
review: I downloaded the app thinking it would be useful. First thing that pops up is a subscription alert for $70?? Thats already a bad sign. They force you to enroll in a 7 day trial with the hopes that you will forget to unsubscribe, so they can charge you that ridiculous fee. On top of that, almost every app feature is locked if you want to avoid that pathway. I spent some time looking for some content that I could access for free and quickly received an influx of rebuttals indicating to ‚ÄúUnlock Calm‚Äù. I got even more frustrated then what drove me to download the app in the first place and deleted the app.

title: Good but,
review: Calm is a really good app but most of the activities you have to get the premier access which is about 70 dollars.  That really bugs me because the things that look interesting are premier access.  It did really change me from going all mad to calm whenever something frustrates me.  Thank you for reading this and I hope you have more activities for those who don‚Äôt want to pay 70 dollars just to get something really relaxing.  Thank you for reading this and have a blessed day.

title: Good app but turns itself on randomly
review: This is a wonderful app. My only complaint is that it turns itself on throughout the day. I pause my music so my boss can talk to me and then the Calm app starts playing. I turn off my Bluetooth so I can talk to someone - Calm starts playing. I open an app on my watch completely unrelated to Calm - Calm starts playing. In each of these cases - the Calm app isn‚Äôt even open on my phone or my watch!!!! Annoying and embarrassing.

title: Headspace should watch out; different style meditation but much better ipo
review: Much better than headspace. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, headspace was revolutionary and the creator and narrator knows what he is doing. What wins me is the sounds playing in the back as soon as you open the app. I‚Äôm a sucker for the sounds of nature and it was long forgotten until I was pleasantly surprised when I first got to the home screen. So far, the lesson I‚Äôve done in Calm, the narrator had a great vibe and was emphatic!

title: The only premium subscription I‚Äôve ever wanted
review:
I have to say, I only wanted this app for the sleep stories, and since there aren‚Äôt any in the free version, I decided to bite the bullet and pay for the subscription. It was worth it. The interface of the app is beautifully and I love the sleep stories.

I would love another story like Calm Airways; one that‚Äôs not really a story but still has narration. That‚Äôs basically the only story I listen to anymore, it‚Äôs just so lovely.

title: Got me to start mediating more regularly
review: I‚Äôve really enjoyed this app so far. It‚Äôs got a lot of variety and helped me to start meditating more regularly. The only reason I didn‚Äôt give 5 stars is because I wish they had 2 voice options for each meditation and story. This is because there are some voices that are weird or are distracting (like Tamera which sounds more seductive than calming) so it would be great to have at least 1 other option. Some of the recordings do but a lot don‚Äôt.

title: How to Meditate
review:
Your very hard work was amazing!
So before I entered this app I was playing  another game and they were hogging were I was playing and I got mad I did not enjoy it at all so then I came to this amazing game and it helped me A LOT so I wanted to write this review because I wanted to show you how relaxed I am now. Thank you so much for everything now I am so relaxed this was amazing now I don‚Äôt have to worry about getting mad I just will go to this app! Thank you!!

title: Cannot be calm to Tamara‚Äôs voice
review: I mostly downloaded this app for the sleep meditations and there are a few that I like from other experts. However, it seems that the creator, Tamara Levitt does the voicing for most of the meditations and a lot of others throughout the app. She seems like an amazing person and I love her backstory, but her voice on the app sounds too fake and like she‚Äôs trying too hard and it makes it difficult for me to feel relaxed. I hope others don‚Äôt feel the same as I do but I just wish there was more diversity with speakers. Or a main voice with a more natural tone. I wont be repurchasing the app.

title: Self care.
review: I‚Äôm a wife of 49 years this September. A mother of 4 children, the oldest of 46 years old diagnosed with Wilson at the age of 18. That‚Äôs when I stop really caring for myself. Now a grandmother of 5 and one more coming in July, I‚Äôm always trying to help my kids even though they are all married, we truly are living very busy times. So in trying to help I forget myself. Then I realized if I don‚Äôt start now I‚Äôll be 69 this month then WHEN????????thank you CALM for your help.

title: Calm
review: Hello, I am Ms. Brenda Lee Ann. I believe that this app is tremendously amazing. Im 85 my doctor has prescribed me to wear adult diapers because of my so called potty issues. (I have an issue with defecting in my pants) Well I happened to have a great deal of an issue yesterday while I was going ‚Äúcommando‚Äù or so those young kids call it and I had an accident. I was stressing out over it for about 20 minuets when I remembered I had the Calm app! I immediately opened it and when I listened to a story I was calmed down!

title: Calm
review: Ok so this app might cost a lot, but if you use it wisely trust me there is a huge difference!! I started to use this app because every night I would get panicked and this app helped me cool down and settle myself. It has meditations, sleep stories , and I love how there is many different narrators so you can pick which voice you like. ( all are soothing)  I‚Äôd recommend this app to anybody who has anxiety issues or problems sleeping because it‚Äôs a game changer!!

title: This is one of my most important apps on my phone
review: The guided meditations are very well done. Tamara Levitt does an excellent job in her sessions. I also love the wide range of meditation types and for different outcomes (performance anxiety, sleep, stress etc.). I just heard Lebron James‚Äô sessions and I think it was brilliant, using a superstar athlete who uses the practice of meditation to prove the effectiveness and importance it has on your life. Excellent job overall and I can‚Äôt wait to see the future updates

title: Saved my life
review: I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever written a review for an app before but it‚Äôs been a year since I downloaded Calm and it‚Äôs legitimately changed my life! Like a lot of people, I was in a pretty bad head space during quarantine 2020, decided to give meditation and this app a chance and between the daily Calms, the specific topic meditations, and the calming music options, I use this app every single day! Well worth the price if you can afford it!

title: Great meditation app, unfortunate voice
review: It's a great app with really helpful guided meditations. It's helped me a lot. However, my one issue with it is that almost all the meditations are voices by Tamara Levitt, and while I'm sure she's a wonderful person and does a great job writing the meditations, I honestly cannot stand her voice. It's so nasally. I pretty much only listen to the meditations that she doesn't do, which eliminates a lot of them. If they had a second voice option for every meditation, I'd 100% give the app five stars.

title: My favorite meditation app
review: Calm is honestly amazing and has helped me through many hard days.  The daily meditations are always great and only 10-12 minutes so you can fit them into your day, and there are cool journaling exercises and a mood check-in so you can do some self-reflection after the meditation.  Highly recommend to anyone who suffers from anxiety, depression, or just wants to get more into meditation at a beginner level.

title: If you are curious about meditation: download
review: I‚Äôm a chaotic mind racing rapid talking fidgeting explosive neurotic mess. I‚Äôm over engaged in politics and under engaged in self-care. This ap has helped me in days with tension and manic obsessive repetitive behavior, and has certainly peaked my considerable curiosity in exploring further lessons in what the excellent instructors refer to as ‚ÄúThe Practice‚Äù. If my self descriptions above hit a note of familiarity with you, take a few sessions and see how you feel. It‚Äôs worth a shot-

title: It‚Äôs missing one big thing
review: The music, stories and meditations on this app are great. But it‚Äôs missing one huge feature IMO and that‚Äôs a sound fade with the timer. If you‚Äôre trying to gently doze off to sleep the sudden cutting off of music or a story is jarring. Ever woken someone up by turning off the tv who had fallen asleep watching? Yea same. The timer is helpful but I either turn it off myself before I fall asleep or it wakes me up when the timer is up. I‚Äôve gone back to my old free app for white noise.

title: Too many locked items
review: As someone who wants an accessible and easy way to meditate, listen to white or background noise, or just listen to sleep stories, Calm would be a great solution. I have actually downloaded this app once before, but I deleted it because there were too many locked items, meditations, and stories. Other than this significant issue, Calm is still great for if you just want to listen to background noise. I wish there were more things i have access to without having to pay so much.

title: Cannot open or delete
review: In the last version the app stopped opening (is stuck on the ‚Äútake a deep breath‚Äù screen). I read the recommendation to delete and reinstall it and intended to do so, but accidentally instead of deleting it removed it from my iPhone ‚Äî but kept in the cloud. No I can neither open nor delete the app. When I open it from the list of my apps in App Store, it is still frozen ‚Äî but there is no longer an option to ‚Äúremove‚Äù it. And in my iPhone settings there is no such option either. What shall I do? I still have a few months of paid premium account, and being unable to use it is very disappointing!
developerResponse: {'id': 21407280, 'body': 'So sorry for the trouble you\'ve experienced! Please try leaving the app open on the loading screen, as this should allow the app to fully load.
