title: You have to be patient, is all I can say
review: The opening admonition to ‚ÄòTake a deep breath‚Äô is almost comically on the nose because, while it‚Äôs true that the app has lots of lovely calming content (honest kudos for that), the performance of the app is so ridiculously poor that you have to literally take a deep breath in order to maintain patience while you wait for screens to switch and for the app to finish going where it wants to go, rather than where you want it to go. Content is great, bu the app functionality needs a ton of work.

title: Donna‚Äôs Sleep
review: Yes, I am putting down my favorites on the list, however there are a couple of things I wish I could have. One is a timer on all the stories, I only see a timer on the sleep stories. The other is that on the sleep stories there are a lot of talk on it. For instance, on the Jazz one, I wish to hear the music and less talk. Some apps are enjoyable with their stories but sometimes you just want the music (with the timer on). I like my Abide app it always has a timer so when I sleep so does the app.

title: My Travel Buddy
review: I love CALM‚Äôs enchanting and mellow sleep stories that gently transport me to other places and times. If I am having trouble getting to sleep or wake up worrying about something (or even can‚Äôt get a song out of my head), I have my favorite stories and narrators who take me away. I am usually asleep by the end, or relaxed enough to drift off. Thank you for keeping travel (and good sleep) alive and well during Covid.

title: No.
review: This app is supposed to calm you right? When I went into that app, I wanted to listen to a story to make myself fall asleep. But this STUPID app made me get a vip/subscription/premium thing so I can listen to the story. So I went to a different story and that was locked too. I did the vip/subscription/premium thing and it still didn‚Äôt work. I had it, so I could listen to a story, but it was still locked. The people who made this app are greedy for money and it‚Äôs full of glitches too. I gave it 2 stars because I‚Äôm sure that this app COULD be good if it wasn‚Äôt filled with glitches.

title: Mostly great, but sleep stories skip
review: I really enjoy the app. The meditations are great, and I really love the sleep stories, which is why I jumped from Headspace to Calm. However, most of the stories I listen to skip and then instead of relaxing, I‚Äôm distracted by the skip. There is one consistent exception: Erik Braa. None of his stories skip! But now I‚Äôve listened to his same stories over and over again. Otherwise great content.

title: No more tossing and turning
review: I know I haven‚Äôt even tapped into all of the resources available on this app but so far the sleep stories are heavenly. They have put my nine-year-old to sleep effortlessly and he comments that he sleeps better when he goes to sleep with the sleep stories. As an adult I find them very relaxing and comforting and I fell asleep much more easily and stay asleep longer. They are kind of a miracle.

title: Calm is where I go to find myself at peace!
review:
This app has been a godsend for my life. 

I‚Äôve noticed subtle yet huge changes in positive ways that have begun to really be noticeable.  
And I have just started to use This tool to fully develop my meditation practice after having been fairly sporadic, 50% of the time only for the last two years.  

I would ask for one slightly huge but specific thing that I struggle with at times of somatic trouble; that the language and the words that you so wonderfully select and choose to use but that may be  pertinent to issues of childhood trauma be softened down a tad more. (My first thought was to add in a complex/ childhood-ptsd selection for those like me.)

Thanks for your being and for this app!

title: Total waste
review: I got this after seeing ads very often thinking it would just be a nice app with soothing sounds and audio etc. to help you sleep, but it‚Äôs a complete scam for money, and totally wrong on the part of the developers for not letting people who want to sleep well have free help. You can only listen to two things without premium (which are useless anyways if you don‚Äôt want to meditate), and it‚Äôs $70 a year for the premium. Totally misleading in the description, they very carefully make it sound like premium is just for a couple of the best audios, but it‚Äôs for 95% of the app. Don‚Äôt bother downloading, I‚Äôd give zero stars if I could.

title: More New Stories
review: I use this app every night for sleep stories. I have 2 requests/suggestions. Please add NEW stories every 3-6 months and as another reviewer said, please have more stories read by Matthew McConaughey! I couldn‚Äôt care less who he is, but his voice is so soothing and relaxing. He only has one story and I listen to it several times a week just for the voice. Thanks for a great meditation and sleep app!

title: Better than a sleep aid sometimes
review: I‚Äôve got multiple disabilities. One of my biggest problems is not being able to fall asleep and stay asleep.  Doctors have prescribed meds but I don‚Äôt want to become addicted. I don‚Äôt even care for taking the Melatonin, so one night I tried ‚ÄúCalm‚Äù. It took some time, and in the beginning, some Melatonin, but now, I stay plugged in all night and sleep like a baby.

title: My review
review:
The only reason I gave this app three stars was because nearly everything on this app has to be payed for. Really, seventy dollars a year just for a sleeping and meditating app? The only reason that I got this app was because of my sleep problems, and I can only get three to four sleep stories without premium. You may as well make people pay for the app, not for the membership! 
   Can you please make some changes and unlock more sleep stories? That‚Äôs all I want.

title: Review
review: I just got the app and wow was I surprised. I‚Äôm 59 years old and have tried many different sleep or relaxation techniques but they have all failed to help. I just went through the first session and I fell amazingly rested and calm almost went to sleep if it weren‚Äôt for me fighting it. I will continue through the 7 days and if results are the same I‚Äôm in thank you for the relaxation time and meditation

title: Cringy Voice
review: I get this app free through my health insurance, which is the only reason I have premium. I love the sleep stories, and really wish I could do the meditations, however I cannot handle Tamara Levin‚Äôs voice (vocal quality and intonation). I believe she is one of the founders or creators of Calm so I really admire her work, but in order to use the meditations effectively we need a soothing voice. Please please fix this issue. I‚Äôve seen multiple reviews saying the same thing.

title: Great meditation app
review: This is a great app. The free version gives you enough to begin. Later on you may want the extra content but the free version is awesome on its own. Included with the free app is a 7 day training program to teach you the basics. I have the premium version. My only complaint is I wish they would add a playlist feature so I can make a custom group of sleep stories that add up to the amount of minutes I generally need to fall asleep.

title: This app changed my life
review: I have never left a review for anything in my life - but this app has been so life changing I had to share. These teachings and the Meditation has given me so much in such a challenging and stressful time. I find myself more grounded, a better listener, more present, and more able to handle my anxiety and stress. Thank you to all the staff and creators at calm. This app has truly been such a gift to me.

title: This is great
review: This app is really helping and if I didn‚Äôt find it I may have still had a lot of anxiety and I really couldn‚Äôt fall asleep. My stomach was upset because I had anxiety and was worrying about stuff. Thank you for this app and I hope that any person out there will take a chance on this app. It has great graphics,music,meditation,stories,and much more. Please please please give it a try  üëçüèª

title: The BEST Meditation App
review:
Sleep Stories, breathing exercises, music and more! I love listening to music when I go to sleep and I absolutely love the ‚ÄúTop Hits‚Äù symphonic/calm mixes (Tracks from Diplo, Ellie Goulding, etc.) 

Don‚Äôt even get me started on the sleep stories...listening to Harry Styles...I could listen to that story over and over again LOL. 

I‚Äôve done a beginner meditation and it really helped me get into a relaxing mindset. I‚Äôm really trying to get into meditation and the Calm app makes it easy to get into it! 

I have to agree with some other reviews... I‚Äôm not a fan of Tamara‚Äôs voice and I personally don‚Äôt think her voice is relaxing at all! 

PS: Through AMEX, I got a free premium year. HOWEVER, I would 100% pay for the full year subscription out of my own pocket

title: It Takes Time
review: I was not immediately impressed with Calm. I found that I had to figure out what specially helped me relax and meditate. I found that there were narrators whose voice and manner worked for me while others didn‚Äôt. The thing is, that until you figure out what works for you, you‚Äôre just flailing around, but once you find yourself it‚Äôs really a top notch experience.

title: the best app on my phone!! üî•
review: I got calm about a year ago and instantly i loved it.  then a few months i bought the membership and it was a lot better!  I use this app every night to fall asleep, i use it when i get anxious and can‚Äôt calm down, i use it when i just want to connect with myself.  It can help anyway. i recommend this 110% and the membership is totally worth the money!! ü•∞

title: Great app, love the variety and options available
review: Like the title says, calm is awesome app, I use it a couple times a day, not just for meditation, but the body calm, and the sleep stories. I am only in my first week of it, and had used headspace previously. I am not sure if Calms programs build off each other like Headspace does. But I‚Äôd like to get to longer and longer meditations with less guidance after their ‚Äúhow to‚Äù course. We‚Äôll see. But I‚Äôm enjoying it so far.

title: Times like theses need some Calm
review: I‚Äôm not a person who would just instinctively get an expensive meditation app, but my sister recommended it, so I gave it a try. It has helped me tremendously deal with the increasing anxiety I feel as news and world events have shattered my sense of normalcy and stability. An app isn‚Äôt going to protect you from the worlds tragedies but this one has helped me a bit and right now that means a lot.

title: Always coming back...
review:
I saw a friend post about Calm 2 years ago. 
Life has a way of pulling us away from what‚Äôs healthy and through the lessons on Daily Calm I‚Äôve learned to judge myself less for the time on and off mediation... It‚Äôs through these meditations that I find myself coming back to it. 
Tamara Levitt does a wonderful job guiding through breathing. This app brings me so much peace and I‚Äôve recommended it to many

title: Love this app!
review: I have had Calm for over a year now and it is amazing. I have the free version and yes, there are very little sleep stories and meditations and no sounds, but they have a lot to offer like mood check ins, a gratitude journal with different prompts and reflection journal. This really is a good app. Definitely recommend. The sleep stories and breathing exercise very greatly help put my 13 year old mind with insomnia to rest.

title: Calm Doesn‚Äôt Notify You In Advance of Your Subscription Renewal
review: I quit using calm because I found a number of other free meditation apps that I liked. Next thing I know I had a renewal charge on my credit card for Calm. My problem is not with the quality of the app. My problem is with the fact that they don‚Äôt email you in advance to remind you of an upcoming renewal. Most apps provide this courtesy. So now I‚Äôm stuck paying $70 for something I‚Äôm not using. I tried to email them but they did not reply.

title: There is virtually no free content regardless of what anybody says
review: There is almost no free content. One of the most frustrating apps I‚Äôve ever downloaded because you literally can‚Äôt even try it out because everything is locked. Listen this app is not free. There is essentially nothing of any value that isn‚Äôt locked. There‚Äôs some stupid sleep series. You literally can‚Äôt find anything else that is not locked. This is not a freemium app this is a straight up pay app that should be charged for from the get go because there is nothing free here of any value. Anyone that says that simply not the case is simply wrong.

title: More to come
review: This is more of a suggestion but as a regular app user I have mainly been using it for the sleep stories because you can choose who is narrating. I find that the main voice-over artist, Tamara‚Äôs voice is beyond annoying. I hope that more of the guided meditations have new voices added so you can choose hers or someone else‚Äôs. Otherwise I love the app and I‚Äôll add more detail when I have a chance to do more than the sleep stories üòÇ

title: Calm is the Best
review: I was new to meditation when I found Calm and I absolutely love it. The music, the meditations, they are all perfect. I love their daily quotes and amazing nature scenes. I have been using Calm for 2.5 years and I feel so much better. When they offered the premium subscription on a discount, I jumped on it to ensure I‚Äôll have it for life, and it was the best decision and best money I could have ever spent on myself. I highly recommend Calm!

title: Good and bad
review: For the most part it‚Äôs a pretty good app and has helped as I‚Äôve traversed this crazy year we‚Äôre having but the daily check-ins are driving me nuts. To have to choose only one emotion during check-in is unrealistic. I‚Äôm a far more complex individual than what can be relegated to only one emotion and the emotions listed don‚Äôt cover all of what a person may be going through. I like the check-in as a means of reminding me to pause and think but the details of the interaction are seriously lacking.

title: Amazing App
review:
I never considered myself a meditation guy until I really needed to start collecting my thoughts and find better ways to cope with stress and anxiety. As an iOS developer myself, I have huge respect for the developers of this application and the effort it took to make something like this, it‚Äôs truly a great application and I deeply enjoy the half hour a day of relaxation it helps put my mind through. 

Thank you

title: Get rid of Tamara Levitt‚Äôs Narrations
review:
I really love this app. I‚Äôve been practicing mindfulness for years and this is an easy and great way to practice and to enjoy adult bedtime stories. 
My only gripe, and it‚Äôs a huge one, is the sleep meditations narrated by Tamara Levitt. There‚Äôs something so artificially California new age about her delivery and it irks me when I should be relaxing. My options are so limited because of this. Most of the story narrators and meditations voices are great, so I don‚Äôt know what happened here. Nails on a chalkboard.

title: Love it but....
review: Sometimes randomly my phone will be playing the sound of water background from the app, when days have gone by where I have not used the app at all.  I have force quit the app to only have it somehow pop back up later on.   It seems to like to default to my music playbar on the ios slide down menu.  Im on a iphone max s with the latest iOS.... not a big deal but dont want a drain on my battery either.

title: Fantastic App
review: I have been using Calm almost daily for about six months. It has really been an amazing tool in my healing of PTSD, GAD, and panic disorder. I wish there were more anxiety specific meditations, but I like most of the meditations, and they are still beneficial. The sleep stories help me sleep through the night. The Master Classes are amazing. I highly recommend the app all the time. Some of the best money I spent last year.

title: Calm
review: It‚Äôs awesome I love listening to sleep stories at night it really helps me calm down and get rid of bad dreams the only down part too it is that I can‚Äôt unlock the calm premium besides  that this app is amazing it has things to calm down anxiety you can do meditation and you can listen to relaxing music and it recommends things for you after you fill out your daily mood for I love it I‚Äôm obsessed.

title: Meh
review: Content is repetitive and narrators are limited if you don‚Äôt happen to like the few they mostly use. I tried to find something relaxing to listen to when going to sleep, but the whisperer stories sounded awful and after starting and stopping a few sleep time stories I figured listening to any of my favorite podcasts would do much better for me. This morning I wanted to check out the stretches, but there‚Äôs no video and you have to listen to the instructions... forget about that too. I got this with AMEX for free, but no way I would pay.

title: Sleep stories are the best!!
review:
Just imagination is everywhere in these 1000 or more or less sleep stories! The sounds are so creative too, it is just the hole thing of sounds are unexpected in a good way i.e. rain sounds are so much more like rain then you would think!
Whoever is reading this review needs to get calm! Less stress and more happiness is on the way as soon as you press the button ‚Äúinstall‚Äù!

title: We did it!
review: Mindfulness rules!  We came high told everyone who needed to know and we took a Happy Ending!!!  Your sacrifices were not in vain, not only did we take a Happy Ending, but we took the best existence. You didn‚Äôt need to know, we end suffering for everyone. The biggest Enemy gets the biggest sacrifice. We‚Äôre going to come up off these huge enemies who need huge sacrifices.  Everyone gets the advantage!!!

title: The Best Meditation App, Period
review: Calm is far and away, my daily go-to for meditation and has often single handedly gotten me through the stress of being a mom, wife, sister, daughter and friend during the pandemic. And it works like magic to help my two boys, ages 9 and 12, when they need to reset their anxiety level. The sleep stories for kids are one of the best kept secrets out there. Every aspect of Calm is top notch.

title: Great at the start, but limiting
review: I downloaded the Calm app to get into a meditation routine and it worked. There are many good series that I would return to, but over time I had listened to most three or four times, and aside from single Daily meditations there was not a lot of new (meditation) content to consume. Having only one narrator/voice as your guide is also limiting when that voice is not one that sits well in your ears (personal preference, I know). Amazing app to get into a meditation habit but not enough to keep me subscribed.

title: Life changing!
review: I know that‚Äôs a dramatic claim for someone who has only had the app for 4 days but truly - I‚Äôm starting not to dread going to bed anymore. I have routinely been falling asleep ok - then am wide awake at 2.30 - lying there worrying about everything under the sun. I have only used the stories so far but they work perfectly! I have had the best 4 nights sleep I can recall since buying the app!

title: Hard to put it down. The sounds and programs just my mind of a worrisome soul.
review:
Calms my very soul. Try the 7 days of anxiety. 

Bedtime stories I enjoy falling off to sleep with a story. Usually,  I can‚Äôt get to sleep now, I wake up hours later and realize I fell to sleep. I listen to another story to clear my mind of everything. It helps me fall !back to sleep which is a big deal I have severe insomnia. 

Cokey Tapper

title: Disappointing
review: Wow.  Just wow. I came to this app to help with my insomnia since my medication stopped helping.  You have to buy everything.  I found two free stories and that was it. They try so hard to make you buy premium but I can‚Äôt spare the money for it. There isn‚Äôt a free section for free stories and even when you search free nothing free comes up.  It‚Äôs very annoying and if there were some that could be added it would be amazing. I would recommend it to plenty but it‚Äôs only for the crowd who wants to spend money on something like this.

title: Great app!
review: This is a great app for mindfulness and meditation. There are a lot of awesome features and most of them really help me with my anxiety and learning how to be calm. The sleep stories really do their job and I almost never finish them because I end up falling asleep! I have a suggestion: I really want more Home Screen backgrounds and background sounds. Like the ocean, snow, dessert, different scenery and sounds like that. Please!!

title: Life-Changing
review: I always knew the value and benefit to a meditation program, but after making it my new year's resolution at the start of 2020, it is clear that this app has impacted my life in an utmost positive way. After roughly 200 meditation sessions in my first year, I only see this as the start. Without meditation during a year as tough as this I simply don't know what I would do. Thank you Calm App :)

title: Tamera
review: I love Tamera‚Äôs soothing yet inspirational voice and the thoughts she brings to me daily. I love the idea that some of these meditations can help in dire situation such as a panic attack or a nervous flight on an airplane. I do miss the Daily Calm voices that used to be on Calm. You used to be able to choose and I had a favorite male voice I found  very soothing and comforting. Now there is no choice on the daily, although there are many variations on the other types of meditations and thought provoking  passages.

title: Saving Grace
review: This app has helped me through some really rough times in my life. This, coupled with therapy, were the primary tools I used to help me get back to where I needed to be in life. I especially love using Calm when my anxiety begins acting up. No matter where I am, I can always find ten minutes or so to step away, plug in my headphones, and listen to Tamera calm my nerves. The week-long sessions are super helpful too!

title: The truth
review: When you have a subscription this app is the most amazing could help you fall asleep, meditate, it help me calm  my kids,  but once I could not afford the monthly membership 95% of the things that helped my family weren‚Äôt oh wait. I really wish they were cheaper or just offer more on the free end. One thing that help me with the sleep stories I don‚Äôt care who is reading me a story long as you‚Äôre calm and collect and I only have one now to listen to because I cannot afford this app in 2020.

title: Could be so good!
review:
App features are good. Been paying for them for quite a while. No complaints on that. But the app falls SO short so so so disappointing. Has zero connectivity with Alexa or any smart devices. Plus has no compatibility or use on kindle devices. Basically the app is useless unless I want to sleep with my phone under my pillow which I don‚Äôt. 

Please fix this. Get an Alexa skill enabled and  get a kindle app created. I won‚Äôt likely continue to pay if I can‚Äôt use this app when I would like in the evening in my bedroom (where we refuse to bring phones).

title: Seriously?
review:
So I downloaded this, seeing all the good reviews and ads, but this is trash. You need to pay for premium to get almost everything. If you don‚Äôt buy it, you just listen to people saying relax, straighten your back... ect. You even need to pay to listen to the music on it!! I just listened to the home page music because it was free. 

I decided to not let that bother me, and I went to the story section. But guess what. Every. Single. Story. Needed. Premium. Like seriously?! I deleted this app the day I got it.

Thanks for reading and please change this. Sorry for being a little rude but it‚Äôs my honest opinion. üòê

title: Disappointing
review: I am just trying to go to bed with Harry‚Äôs peaceful voice enduring me farther into my slumber and then I come to find out I have to PAY to hear this man. Now Harry is worth all the money in the world but I don‚Äôt have extra money to spend I was outraged when I saw I couldn‚Äôt listen to him anymore. I notice every sound at night and it takes me about an hour to knock me out but Harry could do it in 10 minutes (tops) so if I seemed stressed I can blame your app (funny how it‚Äôs named ‚Äúcalm‚Äù because that‚Äôs the farthest thing away from what I‚Äôm feeling) just truly disappointed you would try to take advantage of people like that.

title: Excellent app
review: Night after night I actually worked to get to sleep.  Nothing seemed to work  Them I started seeing ads for Calm. I decided to try the trail.  That was probably one of the best decisions I have made in a long time.  Every  night I listen to a story and after only four nights I  am going to sleep easily and sleeping all night.  I would happily recommend this app to anyone.

title: Calm? CALMING!!
review:
Oh my Gosh. I had horrible sleep problems due to horror game and movie experiences, bad classmates,peers,people etc. I had a really bad time sleeping at night. I would just wake up at one and wait until I saw the sun come up. I was sleeping in school. I tried meditating, essential oils (I know, call me Karen) , sleep medication, etc. SPOILER ALERT: üö® NONE worked. I was stumped, and then eventually, I heard about calm.

Calm Developers:

title: I need to cancel now but your app will not allow
review: The instructions are wrong. The instructions in the Calm settings say to clear a ‚Äú here ‚Äú button and it takes you into Apples subscriptions settings. When you click on the Calm subscription there IS NO Option to unsubscribe. It only provides multiple options to renew at only.  My other listed subscriptions give me an unsubscribe option . I need someone to cancel this year subscription immediately!!!! As it indicates it is about to auto renew on July 12th. I thinking of going monthly but at this point I don‚Äôt know that I will if I can‚Äôt get this cancelled

title: There is nothing to do if you don‚Äôt have premium!!!!!
review: I get super worried a lot and calm has really helped calm me down. The only thing is that you need premium to be able to do basically everything. You can literally only do five things without premium. It is a big marketing trick and it is terrible because there are some people that actually need the stuff premium offers but can‚Äôt afford it. I hope that after you read my review you either add more to the not premium part, get rid of premium, or do something to this issue.

title: Grateful
review: I recently retired from a very stressful job. I‚Äôm finding it difficult to release the anxiety of what I have trained my body and mind to do over the past 7 years. The Calm app is helping me to refocus on myself with the daily meditations, breathing exercises, mood checking, and gratefulness check ins. I needed something/someone to assist me with finding my way back to peace and a feeling of calm! The Calm app has me on my way!

title: Relaxing
review: It‚Äôs my first few minutes and I‚Äôm already in love with the app! It‚Äôs so calming and the stories help a lot! I also love the stories and the music in the background! The reminders will help a lot with my sleep and the reminders will remind me to do one of the sleep sessions or listen to one of the stories. Over all I personally love the app 10-10 recommendation and you should try out calm to!

title: So far so good
review:
I just barely started using this app. I have enjoyed having the app ask me how I‚Äôm doing and it says ‚Äútake a deep breath‚Äù when you open the app. That alone has helped me.

I have tried a couple sessions so far and I realize I get too easily distracted for the longer ones, so I‚Äôm starting with the quick ones.  Looking forward to using the sleep stories and music.

title: Love it
review: As a 13 year old , stress is a part of my daily life. Struggling to get assignments done, homework, and staying heathy. With this app it has helped me like no other app I‚Äôve tried. After my wellness teacher told me about this app I was happy, happy to know another app may help me. And I‚Äôve been using this app between passing periods and before and during tests. This app is worth my time and may be worth yours too!

title: Watch Out if you‚Äôre downloading free app to help you sleep!!
review: Watch out if you are Downloading this app because you are half asleep and cannot fully goto sleep!  I downloaded this app when I was sick and could not goto sleep. I only used it once and Definitely did not sign up for a years subscription!! Just saw it renewed, to make it worse they tricked me into signing into their plan and it was one of their most expensive plans at $60+!!!! :| Hopefully Apple will take care of this considering I have not been using the app and did not mean to sign up for anything. Obviously an accidental easy Apple Fingerprint half asleep mistake! >:|

title: Calm delivers - peace
review: This app has helped more in the past year than years of therapy ever did ‚Äî COVID-19 pandemic (and working from home) notwithstanding. I started with relaxing music, then tried other items offered on the app. I took up a simple 10-minute meditation daily and have noticed I‚Äôm so much more at peace internally. I could never have imagined it would make such a difference. Thank you, Calm!

title: Like most apps
review:
Hello Christi from Calm. I rarely if ever buy an app. The reason...I don‚Äôt trust anyone who advertises a discount but makes you click a link to find out how much the price is. First it‚Äôs a free app, then ah, it‚Äôs only free for a week. If you don‚Äôt sign up then you get the email that tells you OMG can you believe this...there is a discount of 50%...not of what...just 50%. If you click on the link to see the price I bet it‚Äôs the full price but how would anyone know what that was. Reject the gift then there is another gift, how about 13 months instead of 12. 

Really...do you think??? Bet you sleep good at night counting the greens,

title: A nightly ritual
review: Calm has become a huge part of our lives. We listen to the sleep stories together as a family almost every night. The stories are perfect for kids and adults. The voices of the narrators are calming and relaxing. I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this app and don‚Äôt know what we‚Äôd do without it. It‚Äôs truly become apart of our nighttime ritual and apart of our family.

title: Peaceful
review:
Between chronic neck pain and just plain restlessness, I‚Äôm pretty used to not sleeping that great. With Calm, I am sleeping much sounder.  Just put on a soundscape and I instantly feel calmer. 
I also struggle with my mind racing when I‚Äôm trying to fall asleep. I started listening to meditations before my sound scape... it‚Äôs been helping my mind calm down! Love this app! 
I look forward to going to sleep so I can relax and be peaceful!

title: My safe space
review: I‚Äôve been actively using this app for two years now. This got me through some of the most traumatic situations in my life. I cannot appreciate this app enough. Everything I need for my severe anxiety, sadness, and stressful situations. This app is my go to when I am in a bad spot. Even when I‚Äôm happy this app just teaches me how to live a better life. Can‚Äôt imagine what life was like before this app.

title: Amazing!
review: Calm has gotten me to sleep in at least 5 minutes each night, I have a lot of anxiety about things and the stories are so peaceful!! There‚Äôs a different story for everyone and calm has it all, from sounds of rain to 45 minute stories! This is an amazing app(in my opinion) and there variety is amazing!! I love this app and would highly recommend it to everyone. :)

title: It‚Äôs good!
review: It‚Äôs good! But there nothing you can do without paying 70 dollars a year and  unlocking that. So every things locked unless you pay for it. I only found,like, two things that are not locked. But i might buy the unlocking thing or delete it. But it seems like a amazing app! It helps with lots of stress. So if your up to paying 70 dollars a year, you can get the best out of it!!!!

title: Hard to trust - too much political content
review: I‚Äôve used the Calm paid version for two years. I‚Äôve noticed in the past year that the app has become political.  If I‚Äôm going to allow someone to guide my subconscious mind, I need to feel safe with the meditations.  More often this past year the meditations start by reminding people how stressful the world is or how divisive politics are. I have deleted the app because I don‚Äôt like having to anticipate what stressful news topic will be brought up next.  Calm should be a haven and safe space, not a reminder of all the chaos.

title: It helps me to fall asleep
review:
I was very critical about that app. In the past couple months the only thing that would help me to fall asleep was weed. I was at a point were I didn‚Äôt want to smoke much anymore since I was waking up with a headache and not rested. So, I thought I‚Äôll give this app a try and I can say I‚Äôm impressed. I turn on the sleep stories and I‚Äôm out in couple minutes. 
Try it out!

title: Pretty good!
review:
I mostly use this for going to sleep and there are lots of stories to choose from, so I think everyone will find something they like. The same goes for music, although I do think some soundscapes could be longer.

One thing I really wish they would add is an alarm clock that plays any music in the app that you‚Äôd like. I know it‚Äôs geared towards sleep and meditation, but I think peaceful awakening is still related. Please do this!

title: Real value in mindfulness training through Calm
review: Teaching high school and raising a family in a pandemic brought me here. Had I not been in such a desperate state I probably would have been too skeptical for this to have been effective. But instead I convinced myself to try it and it has been an amazing ride. I‚Äôm learning to change how my brain is wired in order to live a healthier, more peaceful existence.

title: Just Right
review: I can always find just what I need with Calm.  My favorite is their sleep stories, with the amazing soothing voices that get slower as the story progresses.  The Daily Calm is a great choice when I don‚Äôt know what I need that day, or there are many categories to choose from.  I like that I can choose my background image and music as well, and can favorite and download to use offline.

title: Amazing App! - how am I Feeling
review: This game has Blowed my Mind Theres moving Pictures I bought new Scenes This App did Win 2018 Award winner Of course this is 2020! 2017 App of the Year! Calming App of the Year. I saw this Picture it said HOW ARE YOU FEELING and I Cilcked on it it showed Emojis Like Sad Happy Relaxed Fuzz And Others I picked Relaxed and I Wrote this: This is the Day where I was Relaxed and I Really Really Love it my Dad has it he slept While The Calm App was on and I‚Äôll do the Same thing :)

title: Just want money
review: Would be 5 stars if you didn‚Äôt have to pay for everything  like in the beginning. I rarely even use now because I can‚Äôt even hear what used to be free stories. Just give us back the stories that were free when you first started and then I would use butyou have taken them away.   The old bait and switch!!!      I have removed you from my ipad and phone because it justs wastes space.  If I sound angry I am. I really enjoyed this app in the beginning and recommended it to friends.  But you have to be rich to enjoy it now.

title: Would love more narrators
review: First, I use this app everyday and most nights. They have a decent library of offerings. It would be 5 stars if they had a much wider variety of narrators for their meditations - or if we could choose the narrator. Too much of their content is dominated by one narrator.  I also wish that you could search by length of meditation. I would love to be able to find a 2,3 or 5 minute session to use when I can‚Äôt do a full 15.  I‚Äôll see how their content develops before deciding to renew.

title: Not so good.....
review: So, I got this app because I had sleeping problems, and by the reviews I thought it was pretty legit. What the hell. Sure, the stories are effective, but there‚Äôs such a small amount of stories that are free. Do the creators care about money more that people‚Äôs health? Because some people get this app, BELIEVING that this will help them sleep after weeks of insomnia. But they wont get that. why? Because this trashy app cares for money more than people. You guys better fix this. At least make more stories available.

title: A little deceiving
review: When you download this app you think you are getting free content, then when you open the app you realize 95% is locked and you will have to pay for the really good information, which you thought was free. I understand having to pay but don‚Äôt advertise as a free app if it‚Äôs really not free. There is a 7 day free trial to try the pay version, but it‚Äôs a little pricey after, it depends on how desperate are you to be calm? The content is pretty good from the small amount that is free.

title: Changed my way of life
review: Gosh how do I start! This app just brought me more happiness in my day to day life. I started by just doing this ‚Äú7 days of happiness‚Äù session that was 12 mins per day and the first one just blew me away! It was about gratitude and I just feel suddenly happier and more thankful. Before Calm I was just having mood swings and I was not generally happy. Finally, because of Calm, I am through that phase! üòÅ -Mia

title: Insanely terrible customer service
review: My issue isn‚Äôt so much the app itself, that‚Äôs fine I suppose though it doesn‚Äôt do a lot for me at night which is what I bought it for. My issue is the customer service. When I did the free trial it implies you can select a month or year after. Wanting to give it a full month I said why not and was then billed for a full year. After emailing them I was told they can‚Äôt refund because that‚Äôs throughApple. So you can take my money (because certainly Apple isn‚Äôt keeping that money from the app creators) but can‚Äôt refund? Never had that issue with any other app.

title: Too little to go on
review: Although I like the idea of calm, the single introductory teasers are frustrating. I already pay for another app and am not sure this one is worth it. It would be nice from time  to offer a whole series for free. Just to show how this one sets itself apart. There are plenty of other options out there that I can check out without paying.

title: Calm
review: I had problems to sleep at night nights, when I saw this app to the first time,I thought it wasn‚Äôt good but when I started using it, I can sleep very good every nights. Thanks for the people who made this app. I can sleep good now.

review: The app itself overall is good!!..but If you don‚Äôt buy premium then your options are literally none.. You get a single bedtime story out of the huge library that you claim to have. I‚Äôm not spending $60 for an app I use maybe 3-4 times a year, and that‚Äôs ONLY on days where I can not sleep what so ever... drop the annual price or add more non-premium vids as well.

title: Just trying to steal your money

review: I use Guided Meditations almost exclusively for sleep. All but a few of Calm‚Äôs offerings of sleep meditations are with one hypnotist, whose voice is grating to me. title: Really Great App
review: Although there is a subscription you need to pay for to get access to all of the features on the Calm app, it is 100% worth it. title: Amazing!
review: This app makes me so calm! When ever I‚Äôm stressed, or angry! This even helps me when I sleep! This app is amazing! Because I have a bit of anxiety and this app totally helps with anxiety! title: Wow.

title: Best App

title: Research before purchasing!

title: Changes your mood üßò‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
review: I think daily calm is amazing and think it is The best way to start your day with Daily calm and  it is so helpful to me that I feel like it is my thearepest and I encourage so many people to download Daily calm and it is so worth it and my whole family does daily calm and it definitely changes your mood and your body. title: Way, way , way tooo short stories
review:
The voices are calming, very soothing but ONLY around 30 mins long. You have to KEEP coming out of your rest to look for a new story. 
  I find after 2 or 3 times doing this, I am frustrated and now fully awake turning to something else to put me to sleep. Now I also have the problem dealing with the anger of not getting TO SLEEP.
 Make the stories a minimum of an hour please.

title: Was good when it first came out
review:
When this app first came out they have so much that you could do with it but as soon as the subscriptions came in to play it just went downhill from there.

title: Not great

This app is no where near helpful for me, and the only thing I recommend is to simply make more things free, or at least let us finish the series, because this is just unfair.

title: Good but some stuff...

title: Excellent Content, Need Sync

title: It‚Äôs good
review:
It‚Äôs a good app, no adds, great sleeping sections and great sessions and stories. But, if you want to pay 70 dollars after your trial to get it for a whole year than great. But if you don‚Äôt want to spend 70 a year on this app then I suggest you get it for about 7 days until your free trial is over. Although it says it‚Äôs a ‚Äúfree trial‚Äù very few and little sections are available. About 7 of the sections are free out of  
Like 2,000 so it‚Äôs not exactly free but it will help and improve your life it‚Äôs a very good app. I hope you enjoy it!

title: Love Misplaced
review: During this session I started missing my wife. She is still with us but not living with us. We lost are way and I hope to be able to find that way back to the love we once shared. My sister says to be patient but it‚Äôs difficult sometimes to let the feelings go. I‚Äôm trying but it‚Äôs tough to see her go to where she calls home when it‚Äôs not with us. I‚Äôm praying one day we will both find are way home.

title: Please write back!
review: So I got this app because I thought it would be relaxing because I sometimes have issues with my parents. But a lot of it cost MONEY. I wanted to listen to music but all of the music you have to get a subscription and first it‚Äôs 7 days free then it‚Äôs 70 DOLLARS a year. I get that on the app you guys need money. But you guys went A LOT overboard. So if you make a few more things free that would be great but until then I won‚Äôt be using it. I might even delete it. If it‚Äôs really suppose to reduce anxiety, then why am I having a hard time with it?

title: Enjoy the app
review: I have been using this for a few days now. I am on the free trial. I love the sleeping bed time stories I knock out in minutes. I feel ten times better after meditation that I feel great afterwards. I will be purchasing the year trial. But I‚Äôm confused with the other yearly options they have. I am in love so far with the app, I wish i signed up a long time ago. The relief it brings.n

title: Great Items w/o Premium
review: I am really enjoying this app and it has helped me tremendously already in being able to fall asleep and go back to sleep when I wake up. I‚Äôm so pleased with the content that‚Äôs available for free, as I just can‚Äôt afford the premium plan but also desperately needed something to help me sleep. It may be limited content, but it‚Äôs exactly what I need. Blue Gold has been my FAVORITE.

title: Get it
review:
Tried this app when it first came out and fell in love with it, but when I realized I had to pay for the content, I signed off it. 

But decided to download it again and pay the fee, that was the best decision I‚Äôve made. Their sleep stories and guided meditations are the best I‚Äôve come across and they help immensely for someone like me who was an insomniac. Would recommend to try it for the free trial.

title: Free Options and Less Celebrity Endorsements
review: During this time of need during the Global Pandemic of COVID-19, it would be a great service to many people to unlock a lot of your features for free. Also, the use of celebrity endorsements does a disservice to people who should be narrating and giving video tutorials on this app such as medical professionals, i.e; psychologists and counselors who are trained for this type of service to the people. This is why I deleted the app as soon as I downloaded it. Making these changes would change my mind about using this app service.

title: I wasn‚Äôt a believer at first. Now I am.
review: For the past 6 months I have been having extreme panic attacks. Some so bad I went to the ER thinking something was extremely wrong. With the right medication and meditation I have been able to overcome this diagnosis that has been taking a toll on my life. I feel more in control and connected to myself than I have in the past. Thanks so much Calm!

title: Great App, ADHD sleep and I am awesome!
review: My daughter struggled to go to sleep from her ADHD meds.  She‚Äôs a middle schooler and uses the stories to listen to at night.  I wish I could be as calm as the people reading these stories.  Whenever I listen to meditations or even some the self improvement podcasts (is that what they are?) it reminds me to be kinder to myself.  Who doesn‚Äôt need that.  They always are adding new content.

title: Sleep stories help more than any other app!
review: I‚Äôve never been great at falling asleep, and have been trying to find ways to help myself improve. I‚Äôve used many of the other mindfulness/sleep apps, but none have worked as well as Calm. Most of the stories I‚Äôve tried put me to sleep within minutes (some melatonin helps, too!). Highly recommended :)

title: Perfection
review:
I have been using Calm for over a year or more. I tend to fall asleep moments into the bedtime stories so not sure how they end. Lol. I have some music I save to listen to while flying. I also listen to some of the meditation when I‚Äôm stressed or need a power nap. It‚Äôs great if you need white noise or want to listen to something more in the background. 
I just switched to the lifetime membership

title: Surfing the suds of breath
review: Thank you so much. Our long road to that which brings us into the light is finally here. Being present in this moment. Future cannot ever arrive because when it does, it‚Äôs the present moment. I see it all now. So clear. Thank you CALM. For 1 am that which is in only this moment no other. Breath in the calm that resides in infinite waves of the water of  the unseen presence of now.

title: Shouldn‚Äôt have updated this.
review: I loved this app and I used to use it allll the time. If there are no more separate sounds we‚Äôre able to listen to I don‚Äôt want it anymore. You guys made this app premium and that completely ruined it. I really hate when things get ruined, I understand wanting to make things better. I‚Äôm not scared of change but this is something that should‚Äôve stayed moderately the same as it was back in like 2015. I do like the scenes that‚Äôs available. Just should put back the individual sounds (firewood, thunder, etc.)

title: Makes it Easy
review: I struggle to meditate. This app makes it a little easier, easy to make it a good habit in my day. I use it every day now, over 500 times, with a record streak of 111 days in a row. I think that feature makes it more intentional, to make meditation a habit like brushing my teeth or flossing . The new free version however has some bug , makes it hard or impossible to text my activity to an accountability buddy that I work with.

title: Saving my sanity üíï
review:

I feel much better after many faithful months. 
I put my phone up to my ear and listen to the rain daily.   I wish you well üíïüå∏

title: Incredibly helpful
review:
Calm has been an amazing tool for me. I love the Daily Calm as the messages and techniques have taught me how to better meditate. I also use the Sleep Stories regularly for both me and my kids. They love it. 

I tried Headspace prior to Calm but find Calm to better fit my needs. It also feels more complete and provides better value for my money. I do subscribe to the premium version.

title: Just download it ‚Äî it‚Äôs incredibly amazing.
review:
I was always ‚Äúthat guy‚Äù who thought mediation was for some people. Because of this app, I am convinced that everyone needs this. I used it specifically for sleep, but now I am using it on a daily basis to help me focus, think broader, improve leadership, and so many other things! I am very impressed!

As far as the premium purchase. Just get it ‚Äî no amount of my writing will convince you enough how much its worth it, so just try the free trial ... it has changed my life and I rarely say that about app services.

In a fast pace world where there is constant moment, this app reminds us to slow down ‚Äî enjoy the moment. 

The closest thing to stopping time.

Great work Calm Team!

title: The best app I‚Äôve ever purchased.
review: Calm has become an important part of my everyday life. It helps me emotionally, physically and spiritually. Every meditation, story, and selection has been curated with detail and love. Tamara is a bright light and essential role model and mentor. If you‚Äôre seeking a sure way to enhance sleep, slow your heart, and connect with yourself with mindfulness, then it‚Äôs the best app for you to get. The only app you need.

title: First Day
review: Today I start with me. No one else, just me. As I take a breath I feel the calm inside of me. I wonder how my next day will be. I hope just the same as I feel right now. Today I start with a new me. This is going to work and I am not going to let anyone come in my way. Thank you God for allowing me to have this precious time. To a new beginning. It‚Äôs all about the meditation.

title: Lifesaver
review: This app was a lifesaver for me. As a registered nurse working on a Covid unit I was pretty much at the end of my rope. I used Calm all day every day!!! I used it to get me through my day and to help me sleep. It was worth every penny. I had never been much for meditation, but just putting the screen on the ocean with soothing sounds while I charted helped me immensely. I could go on and on, highly recommend this app.

title: Meditation
review:
I‚Äôve had this wonderful app for over a year. I have practice yoga most of my life with meditation at different times of my life but more regularly now. 

My only thought regarding Calm is sometimes I wish the meditations were a little longer.... the silence and the breathing. Of course this is something I do on my own but I enjoy the Calm guided meditations with words of wisdom! 
Thank you!

title: Tamara Levitt is What‚Äôs Wrong With The World
review: If you‚Äôre looking for a patronizing wu-wu ramble to make you question meditation all together, you‚Äôve come to the right place. Inane fast-food wisdom combined with the effected, breathy voice of the narrator, Tamara, is sure to cause the listener to be less calm and more annoyed than when they started. A session on this app feels less like meditation than it does a solo-podcast with an air headed host looking to sell her line of healing crystals.  The app would be improved by replacing Tamara with literally anyone that doesn‚Äôt sound like they‚Äôre trying to push salvia on elementary school kids.

title: I pay for crashes??
review: I pay for this app and it‚Äôs expensive. I try to use it all the time but the last two updates have been absolutely horrific. It crashes on me multiple times a night so I just gave up and went to another site. Now after this latest update it won‚Äôt even open past the ‚Äútake a deep breath‚Äù screen üò°üò°üò°  I‚Äôm REALLY dissatisfied with how glitchy and slow it is. I pay a lot of money for this app but if they don‚Äôt fix the crashing issues I‚Äôm canceling. It‚Äôs appalling that my 80+ dollars app won‚Äôt work. üò°üò°üò°üò°

title: I feel i can trust LeBron James
review:
Bringing up two sons who idolize any sport with a ball in it I would also need to learn the super stars they would follow mentally as well as physically.  LeBron James can also help this 71 year old caucasian woman who would like to channel her
energy in a more positive way.  it‚Äôs difficult to get older and not have those two boys to chase all over God green earth.  Thank you for your words.

title: The easiest, best way to make time for yourself.

I recommend it to all of my friends.

title: Love this app but ... a request.
review: I really love everything about this app except one thing:  I would like to be able to choose a male voice for the meditations. The content is great and relevant to me. title: Great, but one thing!
review: I love this app, but I won‚Äôt spend the money per year to buy the full app. I‚Äôm not complaining about the price though. I feel like the people who have mental problems but don‚Äôt have the money for the full app don‚Äôt get what they need. Developers of this game, if you are reading this please add more features that are free! There really aren‚Äôt enough things to do if you don‚Äôt spend money after the free trial. Thank you for reading this, and hope you all are doing alright!

title: Genuinely a Life Saver

title: I think it‚Äôs great
review: I downloaded calm a while ago because of a family member and I listened to a couple of there stories on the app to go to sleep and for a person that doesn‚Äôt fall asleep until 3-4 am listening to call I fall  asleep at 12-1 now I highly recommend the meditation to but love the sleep story‚Äôs my favorite stories are a journey to the stars and dream with me

title: Great new additions!
review: With the addition of the amazing Jeff Warren, on the daily trip I am now back to listening to my calm app every night!When I started listening to the calm app I did his 30 days of meditation along with several sleep teachings and meditations, and have made great strides in my ability to relax, focus, sleep better. title: Keeps quitting
review:

I would have given this a 4 but I can‚Äôt give a non functional app more than 2. I used to like the stories especially about train rides.

title: Great App

I really miss going to live yoga classes during COVID & listening to a real person guide through mediation via CALM in the comfort of my own home is great.  Thank you for creating these sessions!

title: Amazing app.
review:
This app is amazing but I can not afford it. It‚Äôs wonderful you made this very smart and useful app. I think people need it more than ever- but what good are all of these tools if you can‚Äôt afford to use them?
I know these apps were made by people with great ideas to help others- but what about the huge population that can‚Äôt afford the help. I would venture to guess that the ones that can‚Äôt afford it are the ones who could benefit from the app the most .

title: Has saved me during COVID!
review: The Calm App has been my saving grace since March. I‚Äôve meditated before but never this consistently. The daily calm 10 min meditation is always meaningful and pleasurable, starting my day off in the right way. I look forward to meditating now and regret it when I miss it. Download this now to stay calm, centered and mindful!  The sessions to help with sleep are also fantastic.

title: Amazing

I have had this app for only 3 weeks, and I am feeling calmer and more patient 24/7

title: Very effective at relieving my stress
review: I‚Äôm on a strict budget and hesitated to pay the yearly subscription, but it‚Äôs the best money I‚Äôve spent. I have severe white coat syndrome. My blood pressure readings are very high, but after ten minutes of a Calm meditation, they are normal. I have had an echocardiogram, which showed no signs of sustained high blood pressure, so I know it‚Äôs normal. The Calm App gives me the ability to get accurate bp readings. It‚Äôs wonderful.

title: Love it.
review:
Originally I was unhappy with billing process, however once it was sorted I was able to fully explore and enjoy the app. 

It‚Äôs an incredibly helpful tool when it comes to manageable meditations, improving focus, and instilling an overall calmness. I‚Äôm grateful that I found it, and use it every day. I find the ‚Äúdaily calms‚Äù to be especially helpful for me. 

I highly recommend this app!

title: Disappointed
review: I had calm for a couple years. I deleted it when I moved out of the country for a couple years. Now that I‚Äôm back, I reopened my calm account and wow!  How useless it is now unless you commit to pay $80 dollars a year. In this case more is not better. It‚Äôs just more confusing and expensive. I‚Äôll try other mindfulness apps.

title: Good meditations... for a hefty price
review: The meditations and app aesthetic are lovely; the price not so much.  This app falls into the exploitative subscription scheme that‚Äôs taken over the app market, and it‚Äôs not worth it for the content provided.  $70/year for access? You pay less for an AAA game with photorealistic graphics, and that‚Äôs a one time purchase, not a yearly fee.  Features that used to be free, like the basic body scan, have now been moved into paid content.  There are no free meditations besides the timed, undirected meditation and a 7 day introductory series.  This is no longer worth using.

title: I love the Calm app
review: I have found it challenging to practice meditation & visualization in the past. I‚Äôm so grateful I found out about Calm through the high school where I work. It's perfect to start my prayer time in the morning. Also, I took a look at a ‚Äúfree‚Äù app for educators yesterday, but I found that Calm is much more sophisticated & I like that it is something that I‚Äôm comfortable to use with my own faith practice.

title: Has helped me a lot so far
review: Great app so far I am in 30 day trial. I love that I can turn off the background sounds completely because I have tinnitus and sometimes too many layers of sounds are difficult to not focus my attention on. I do wish I could search by narrator as there is one woman I really love - is that possible and I don‚Äôt see it? I tried googling hah thanks!

title: It is a start

I‚Äôm not trying to erase the past or forget, because that is how history repeats itself. I am trying to use meditation to take a break, clear my mind, and move on with my everyday life consistently and mindfully.

title: This is a great app!
review: Ok,ok I know what your thinking ‚Äúit‚Äôs not that good‚Äù but trust me it is, of your having a bad stressful day I would recommend calm, and if your having trouble sleeping I would also recommend calm. I remember 1 night I couldn‚Äôt fall asleep so I went on calm and listened to the story the stories are so calming and they have every little detail with a calm voice good enough to help me fall asleep.

title: Life Changing
review: I use the daily meditation to start my day. It‚Äôs made a huge difference in my mental well-being. Tamara has a soothing voice - makes it easy to listen. My kids and I love the sleep stories - we listen to one almost every night. I have also used the meditations related to calming anxiety - they‚Äôve been especially helpful during this pandemic.

title: Absolutely perfect for stressful moments
review: I used to have a lot of trouble sleeping and calming my thoughts during stressful moments. Now Calm is my GO TO the second I‚Äôm feeling anxious or in need of some calming comforting breaths. This is a fabulous app and to have it work so poorly is sad considering my insurance is providing this to me for anxiety. Get it together calm!

title: Daily Mindfulness
review:
I‚Äôm enjoying the app so far. I‚Äôve tried the free trials and trying to justify the price tag of daily use. 

As I dig deeper into the app, I am finding it more useful and finding more ways to be present and experience mindfulness. 

I‚Äôm giving it four stars because I see where it could use more content, however, that could change over time. I‚Äôm very pleased with the content that I have explored so far.

title: Worth the hype
review: I heard about calm for a long time but thought it‚Äôs a huge hype and what the app offers I can find for free somewhere else. Well now that I am trying it for free, I would definitely pay. It‚Äôs a one stop place to check in with yourself, a place to center yourself with the daily mediation and send you off to sleep with night time stories. I recommend!

title: Total rip off
review:
I went to the website and tried to sign up for a basic membership or trial but the site literally will not let you

title: Life-changing
review: My life has never been the same since I discovered the art of mindfulness through Calm. This app transforms your life and your relationship with yourself, others, and all that you know (and don‚Äôt know). Find yourself anxiously scanning for news? Download Calm. Are you stuck? Download Calm. Do you feel perpetually sluggish, bored, and distracted in this challenging time? Download Calm.

title: Love but needs a couple things...
review: Best app I‚Äôve found so far. Love the variety and who knew train stories were so cozy?! Other than that I love this app.

title: Great app
review: This is a great meditation and mindfulness app. Love the variety of activities and tools, especially the meditations and soundscapes to help with sleep. My only issue is that I don‚Äôt really care for Tamara‚Äôs voice, so since she does most of the talks, I don‚Äôt utilize those as much and don‚Äôt get to use the app to its fullest. There are a few where you can choose a different voice and would love to see that option for all of them.

title: Jeff is amazing but the app is too cluttered
review: First off, Jeff Warren‚Äôs How to Meditate series is fantastic-  unpretentious and well done. The app itself needs editing, or an ability to be decluttered.  There‚Äôs just too much stuff. Children‚Äôs bedtime stories. Thomas the Tank engine.  Daily philosophically advice, And a really annoying habit of flashing over to a photo of some nature scene when I‚Äôm trying to navigate the app. I would prefer a more zen like experience with less clutter.

title: must be willing to pay money to actually experience
review: hi! the ad for this app really appealed to me because it was relaxing and you could interact with the app. however, when i downloaded the app there wasn‚Äôt anywhere to interact with it (you could only listen to thing and breathe and do mood check ins) which made the ad a bit misleading. not only that, but almost everything costed money which is a little disappointing. i know you need to make money, but i suggest giving more than 5 free options. maybe i would‚Äôve bought calm premium is you gave me more free options so i could‚Äôve actually known more about the app. i would also suggest adding in stress relieve interactions like what was in the add because that was the main reason i downloaded this app. i hope you enjoy my feedback.

title: More than worth the money
review: This is the best app I‚Äôve ever used. I was a little skeptical about the Calm app, because I didn‚Äôt know what it could offer. It offers everything you could want, and more. I keep discovering new things about it. I‚Äôve had no problems at all with it, and I loved it so much I got it for my daughter as well. I highly recommend it.

title: the vibe is right
review: The right sounds to put me at ease. I have been practicing meditation for a while now. I fell out of it when I was going through a transition in my life and for some reason it was very difficult, for me, after the transition to dive back into meditation. title: Changed My Life
review: I saw a Calm advertisement on TV at the beginning of the pandemic. I‚Äôd been feeling the need to center myself in general so it appealed to me. I recommend it to anyone who is willing to sit with themselves and grow. Tamara Levitt is awesome!! I am grateful that I discovered Calm!üíê

title: COVID

I will be looking for either in person or another meditation class. I try to fall asleep to their sleep section and the stories don‚Äôt help. It makes my mind wander and stay up. Maybe this app isn‚Äôt meant for me. Therapy has been more useful and I think in person mediation class would be for me.

title: !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!TOTALLY WORTH IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Pretty good
review: I find this app very useful for when I‚Äôm super stressed about something.  That being said, I don‚Äôt use it that often (maybe three times a month). title: Wow!!ü§©

title: My Opinion

My opinion you should have kept your contributions to yourself and continued to make people calm. I have deleted the app and unsubscribed to the emails. Wish I could get a refund but I am sure that will not happen. Also tried to reach out through email with no response.

title: Thank you Calm!

She ALWAYS wakes up crying saying ‚Äúthe eyes are back!‚Äù So this has CALMED her down and gets her to sleep the rest of the night without having red eyes. I am very grateful for Calm.

title: Looks Promising

title: Just a Few Moments of Each Day
review:
To be able to stop and see what I have done throughout the day, and stop. Where did I start, where am I, and where am I headed?

It really is rather simple, and can bring much joy to the day. So rather than letting myself become tense, angry, or unhappy; just let me take a few moments of the day, and rebalance the rest of today.

title: Calm

I‚Äôve almost reached transcendence , just want to spread the wisdom and love to family and trusted friends. Enjoy, best investment I‚Äôve ever made.

title: Essential

title: Opportunists
review:
During a pandemic, arguably people need a dose of calm more than ever‚Äîand this app exploits that need by charging a premium amount for their content. Almost NOTHING in unlocked in the free account. And you‚Äôll pay $65 a year to unlock the rest. Not a large amount to some, but a record number of people are without work right now, and $65 could literally mean the difference between eating for a week or not. Asking anyone to pay that price right now is not only greedy, it‚Äôs unconscionable. The developers are money-grubbing, price-gouging jerks taking advantage of desperate people in need. 

Thanks for nothing, Calm.

title: Good but not great.

title: Day 1
review:
Like most others, I was not interested in purchasing the app in any fashion whatsoever. I‚Äôve heard great reviews and honestly wanted to give it a try but just couldn‚Äôt commit to that minimal amount.

title: Good app but...
review:

title: Meditation Exploration
review: I‚Äôm doing the 30 day meditation exercises, and I‚Äôm really enjoying them. However, listening to Day 14 - Space Odyssey, it is difficult to find the silence. title: Changed the breathing exercise
review: I liked the previous breathe bubble so much better. I don‚Äôt like the new one because: the music is different with a wavering pitch that is quite irritating, the duration of the breathing is different. I liked the balanced inhale and exhale of previous versions. I understand that some people may like the longer exhale. Why not give us the option of choosing the duration of inhalations/exhalations and fix the music? Or give us a choice for that, too?

title: Good ideas...terrible voices
review: We love the breathing exercises, the scenes and some of the music. But the founder of Calm, Tamara (?), is awful to listen to. Manages to be relaxing without being cloying or pretentious. The other readers of the calming or sleep exercises sounded the same to me. Needs better voices beyond the celebrities reading nighttime stories. Also needs more in the kids department beyond the sleep stories. Real sleep meditations.

title: Amazing app but crashes sometimes

title: Do Not Buy. Rip-Off Alert. Read fine print
review:
I downloaded the free app. It gives you the right to cancel at anytime. Unfortunately very hard to do. If you miss the week free period you are locked into a year contract. And that very app tells you they cannot cancel it for you and in part because it has an invalid date - what???? 
Then the app directs you to another area on their web site where you can upgrade or add on beyond your one year 
No answer from company yet
Apple did respond two months later with contact Calm. This is not an apple issue 
Do NOT buy or even try

title: I love this app

title: Love Calm

title: Very approachable meditation app
review:
I really enjoy Calm, and it has helped me incorporate meditation into my daily life.  I like the daily calm sessions, and the multi day paths (‚Äú7 Days of ______‚Äù, ‚Äú21 Days of ______‚Äù).

I appreciate the subtle encouragement it provides through feedback in the application, as well as notifications.

If you want to try meditation, and tot want a welcoming lie let approach with East to listen to voices, this is a great choice.

title: Pointless...
review: Why create an app that is literally designed to help people sleep for free only to force them pay 70 USD like why?! Are you trying to become like EA I‚Äôm not sure when this app was created but From the ratings I can tell that it was very good back then but, then here comes the part where you‚Äôre trying to become the new EA you cared about your people, you focused more on quality!! But then....you decided to forget about Quality and focus more on Money...why!?!? Why are you going to force people that need serious help sleep ing to pay 70 USD just so they can get better sleep.

title: So great!!!

I really love this appüëçüòç

title: Okay...
review: This app used to be awesome when I first installed it a couple of years ago but now the app just cares about promotions by celebrities and mostly everything you have to pay for were as before you had mostly free features but if you went premium you had a nice selection as well, I feel as though now if you don‚Äôt have premium then everything is just useless, not to mention the app only made me calm at the moment when I went back to regular daily routine I felt stressed again!

title: Everyone needs this app!
review: This app has been a lifesaver for navigating change. I just turned 31 so my inner circle has gone through so many changes: marriages, babies, jobs. Personally I struggle with chronic pain, depression and anxiety. This app (specifically daily calm meditations) have helped me to cope in a very helpful and positive way. Thank you calm app! I also love the Lebrun James talks about success.

title: Great app
review: Calm is a great app in general except there are only a couple unlocked things you can listen to: everything else is premium. I would like to suggest maybe one or two nature melodies that are not on calm premium, so one would be able to hear some things that this app provides and then  one could see if they like it and buy premium. All in all it is a very nice and calming app for almost all ages to enjoy, I would definitely recommend to a friend.

title: Really REALLY good app üòä
review: When I saw the ad for the app I didn‚Äôt think it was going to help me with anything besides being a waste of space on my phone but then I used it a couple times and fell in love with it I can‚Äôt sleep without the sleep stories and has really improve my sleep a lot. I definitely recommend this app if you have trouble sleeping üò¥

title: Mindfulness
review: I downloaded the Calm app as one of my two mindful apps for a class I am taking currently. This app helped me take my mind out of stressful environments and put it elsewhere. The only downside with this app is that it is on a free trial and then you have to pay for it. However the sounds and people who guided the meditation were very soothing. I enjoyed this app, but not sure if I will continue because of the subscription fee.

title: Love this app!
review: I use the CALM app for sleep stories at night and daily morning meditation. I also love the focus music options during work periods. Just recently I lost a colleague and the grief stories were so helpful. I have also enjoyed the daily reflections snd quotes. In a fit of anxiety , the emergency breaths are an indispensable resource. I don‚Äôt know what I would do without the CALM app!

title: Calm helps
review:
I‚Äôm finding artists and collections of sounds that surpass classical music when the spirit needs rest. The visuals are done well for an app. In one app I find relaxing instrumentals with and without nature‚Äôs music, meditations and peace. I am enjoying your selections.
 
    Artists that I am familiar with are putting music on Calm that reveal how much they resonate with the new age. Thanks for all your efforts.

title: Calm
review: I love the calm app because it really helps you to focus in the moment. Takes things off your mind for the time being. It does help relax you and take away your stress and worries for that time period. It kinda does help with your mental health too as well. I would Definetly recommend this to all my family and friends to get the app too!

title: Total fraudulent trial program: once you click yes they bill you for a year and you cannot get out!
review: I found the site did not provide enough substance for the cost; so then I tried to cancel before the trial date ended; The site made it absolutely impossible to cancel and then immediately charged me a FULL year subscription without any notice. I think this is the most fraudulent set up and con job imaginable. Lure people in, make it impossible to stop and then bill them for a year of service with absolutely no way to get out of their fraudulent contract. Such a scam.

title: Calm is such a gift
review: This app makes our lives better. The 10-minute Daily Calm reminds us gently of ways to live in harmony. The Calm music selections are lovely background for writing, reading, sleeping or a light workout. And the sleep stories are exceptional. You can even hear them in a foreign language.  Many thanks to the entire Calm team for all that they do.

title: Getting back to sleep
review: It never fails that I wake up in the middle of the night with my mind racing. I‚Äôm positive there is no way I will go back to sleep. Then I put on a story and I think, for sure I won‚Äôt fall asleep with this person talking! Somehow I wake up in the morning and I know I never heard the whole story. I drifted off into a wonderful slumber! Thank you Calm!!!!!

title: So many uses!
review:
I have been using this app for years!  It‚Äôs the most used app on my phone. Here are a list of ways I utilize the features:
1.  I play gentle music in my AirPods while reading to drown out distractions.
2.  Plug in AirPods again for a 26 minute nap some afternoons.
3. Decompress with a meditation every now and then if I feel like it. 
4.  Play a sleep story before bed when I am having trouble unwinding from a busy day.
5.  Turn on soundscapes or a Back To Sleep meditation when I wake up before I need to in the middle of the night. 
6.  Background music for my homeschooling classroom when we need to refocus and limit distractions. 

I love it!  It is so much a part of my life now!!

title: Money
review: So I‚Äôm a school student that is stressed by moving into middle school which is 7 and 8 grade for my school system and I can‚Äôt do anything on the app with out asking my parents to get a subscription. I can barley ask them for money to spend in town let alone I just asked them for over $80 to try to start a small business. I have been working on trying to ask them about stuff and not being able to do anything in the app with money is hard and I was just wanting to relax and relieve stress but this has stressed me more.

title: Saved me a trip to the ER
review: So I just downloaded this app 5 minutes ago. I was having heart palpitations and even after they stopped my heart rate was still up.... I started getting worked up and would freak myself out. After listening to one of the calming sessions for anxiety my HR is back to normal and I feel very calm.... definitely keeping this app.....

title: First of all I can‚Äôt access it
review:
Secondly, it tells me I have to pay for it. In one place it said I paid for the first seven days or excuse me I don‚Äôt pay the first seven days then it‚Äôs 69 something a month. In another place it says I have one year free. The only reason I signed up for this is because Kaiser said it came with Kaiser and it‚Äôs free.
Beyond this, I can‚Äôt even access it I accessed it yesterday and it was fine today, using the same password the same email I can‚Äôt get to first base. This is fake news first promises everything bad. Please fix this and stop promising what you don‚Äôt deliver.

title: Harry Styles Saved My Sleep
review: Listening to that slow, smoky voice read a bedtime story has been on the top of my bucket list for YEARS. It finally happened last night and I slept like a ROCK. I have PTSD and night terrors, so sleep has always been an issue for me. But for the first time in  LONG time I slept through the night. This sleep story was literally a dream come true.

title: LeBron has the perfect voice for guided meditation
review: I am a new women‚Äôs basketball fan.  I was really interested in LeBron‚Äôs series.  His voice and presence is PERFECT for guided meditation.  I used to  listen to WBB podcasts to take my mind off the pressures of life in order to fall asleep.  No longer.  I now alter between Matthew McConaughey and LeBron James for my sleep hygiene routine.  Would also like to hear non-basketball series from LeBron.

title: Peace&Calm
review: WOW this app relaxed me in <5 minutes. I went from content & slightly anxious from my day, to almost asleep. I hope this app gets 5 big stars on their page one day. It has every feature you could need, from automaticity to incentives to keep you using the app. I am glad I got back into using this app as part of my daily meditation routine.
