review: This app used to be amazing! I would always turn to it for my meditation needs. However, over the years, more and more content has been placed behind a paywall. Now all of my favorite music has been locked away when it used to be available for everyone. This app‚Äôs interests have turned toward money rather than providing people a place to relax. People should not have to worry about finances if they‚Äôre trying to calm down.

title: Saved me from a lot of stress
review: I‚Äôve been stressed out with a ton of school work and other problems that won‚Äôt leave my mind. They were always in there, never leaving. Calm made them leave and I‚Äôve been a lot happier and not as stressed. I‚Äôve only been using it for a couple of days now, but it helps a lot. Thank you developers.

title: Just what was needed
review:
My wife and I love this app. We‚Äôre in our 70‚Äôs and have both made several attempts to get into meditation but always failed for one reason or another. With Calm we have a routine that works for us and we now regularly meditate. We also love the sleep stories. Perfect for those nights when you just can‚Äôt calm the monkey.
Great job!

title: I love his app!
review: I‚Äôm a teen aged and life is tough I get stressed a lot all I have to do is put in my earbuds and listen to my favorite sound. I remember several times when I‚Äôve had terrible migraines and Calm has helped so much! I seriously recommend for anyone of all ages even kids, I love to listen to the stories if I can‚Äôt sleep. Hope you enjoy this app as much as I do!

title: Too much Talking
review: There‚Äôs too much guidance to the point it becomes irritating. Everytime you get into a space the incessant guidance distracts. There are ‚Äúless guidance‚Äù options but they are limited and restrict you from going back to certain timer settings. This app has gotten me through high stress anxiety attack periods but one of the key points of meditation is to quiet the mind which hard to do when the guide won‚Äôt give you a moment of silence. title: Compared to other meditation tools I‚Äôve used this one is the best
review:
The introduction to meditation course was the one that got me hooked. I‚Äôve enjoyed meditation before I had come to known Calm but didn‚Äôt understand what meditation is until I took this course by Jeff Warren. 

I really appreciate the daily meditation, as well and the constant update on content. 

Thank you Calm Team!

title: Turning my mind off for the night
review: I love falling asleep listening to the stories. Focusing on the storyteller allows my mind to quickly stop thinking about the events of the day. There is no opportunity for me to start worrying over what if‚Äôs. I fall asleep during train rides, Bob Ross lessons, naturalist John Muir stories, chapters from well-known books and many other adventures.

title: Nice App
review: I like this app a lot. It has nice features such as being able to set reminders for different things (daily check-ins). The worst part about this app is that almost all of the really cool features and options you must ‚Äúunlock‚Äù by paying for a subscription. I do not pay for it, and therefore have limited access to what I can actually do on the app. I‚Äôd much rather the app just have a one-time-fee to access all parts of the app.

title: Pretty good
review:
I mostly use Calm for the Sleep Stories.  They really do help with my sleep.  I don‚Äôt like the daily Calm, for some reason I find the narrators voice really irritating   I‚Äôve tried over and over and can‚Äôt stand her voice and delivery (Tamara) 
I have listened to some of the visitor meditations and like them better. 
I would like more new sleep stories.  I really like the ones about travel.  Eric Braa is my favorite his voice is soothing.  
I‚Äôd like to hear more chapters of Treasure Island!  
Lynne W

title: I tried.

review: I only use Calm for the sleep stories for which I would give almost 5 stars. I‚Äôve tried the meditation and some of the other things, but find them grating and triggering. title: Calming nightly
review: I would like to share that I‚Äôve been using cam for months now and it has helped me with my sleep patterns and being able to sleep much quicker and deeper than before. I have one request, that you all add the ability to cast to tvs or other devices. I have TVs hooked up in various rooms and would be nice to be able to cast to them and share my stories with my children.

title: Love it but...
review:

I turned the scene sound outside app to "0" off, however, it will come on by itself evenever it wants! I had to open the app to stop the sound, but later it came on again! It's extremely annoying that it turns on whenever it wants! It's more stressful then it's helpful! Please fix it!

I'm running iOS 14.2.

title: I like it but
review: This is a really good app and it made me feel really relaxed in just a few minutes but most of it needs to be payed for and I am a kid who has no job so I can‚Äôt pay for it but there is a tab for money shortage, I like the way it is interactive as well and helps plan a schedule for the meditation ‚Äúclasses‚Äù or stories. title: Hate Subscription

title: Very disappointed in how I‚Äôve been treated!
review: I have been charged a yearly subscription when no one in our family still has this app. I have inquired through the appropriate steps and have been told that they can do nothing on their end. So, I will now have to ask my credit card to dispute the charges, which means I will have to get new cards and set up new autopayments. This is so annoying! DO NO get this APP! If you cancel it, their system does not listen. It‚Äôs been months and we did our canceling months before the deadline.

title: It's a much needed friend
review:
It's like that person you need to help set you straight when we steer of course. It's right there to help, amazing layout, easy to use. Covers a wide range of self-improvement (too many to mention in the best way possible). I feel great and will definitely continue to use application. Keep up the great work.

Best Regards,
Anthony Abernathy

title: Takes $70 out of your account during a pandemic
review: I never thought an app that was literally called calm would stress me out so much. I did the feee trial and then I notice a few days later that $70 dollars is missing!!!!!! I get after the free trial you obviously need to pay but why did I get no kind of notification and why DIDNT they charge me monthly instead of for a whole freaking YEAR!! That is so shady. We are in a pandemic. I don‚Äôt have money all like that. I downloaded the app because I thought it could help me through this hard time but it just made everything worse.

title: Only works for a whileüò•
review:

Lindaüò•

title: Keep your political ideology out of my mailbox!
review: I had no idea that by subscribing to this app that I would be subjected to a mailbox full of this company‚Äôs political ideology and support for a very questionable organization. title: shameful way to make money during the pandemic
review: I worry that the capitalist way of making money during this pandemic is not human. Instead of providing some needed relief first hand, another service to charge big buck. Do you or Apple are aware about unprecedented job losses or anxiety at all (Apple, besides the fact you silently collecting data). Do you think you can do something better but not monetize someone‚Äôs grief? What moral values do you have after all? What is you role, where do you stand in today‚Äôs society? I don‚Äôt need answer but you please ask yourself. A mirror is your best friend.

title: NEW DAY
review:
I‚Äôve resisted being still most of my life.
This is a new practice for me.
MY HOPE:
After 65 years of racing, distractible thoughts, and greater awareness of the voices that want to steal, kill & destroy, I‚Äôm hopeful for creating a space in my head that doesn‚Äôt critique and keep score of how I‚Äôm performing while learning and practicing the CALM way. Finding a pace of life that gives life and receives life.

title: How to install on phone when I have Calm on IPad?
review:
I like Calm and purchased a subscription and installed on my iPad. 
I would like to have it on my phone also. Since I have the subscription I would like to put it on my phone, too. How do I do this?

title: This is Powerful
review: For the first time meditating, it was amazing. I never realized how powerful this could be. After 10 minutes of sitting straight up, breathing deeply. I had a completely clear mind. I felt at one with everything. Then when I opened my eyes, it was like the first time I had opened them. Thank you. I encourage everyone to try meditation.

title: Love this app
review: Love this app, it has helped me very very much.  The only thing I would like to see different is the ability to have unlimited favorites.  When I keep adding favorites it knocks some of them out of my list cause there is a limited number you can use.  Other than that, I could not be without this app.  Love it!!!

title: Sleep stories
review: I love love love calm. It helps me sleep every night and I love all of the guided meditations. I would like to suggest being able to queue up sleep stories, and sort by length. It takes me a while to settle in, and sometimes I need to put on a second sleep story, but the light from my phone/ interaction with the app takes me out of my sleepiness.

title: Delightful variety of resources
review: Daily Calm provides many teachers and many modes of working one‚Äôs awareness.  It would be impossible to spend enough time to explore it all and still do one‚Äôs regular life! The graphics and photos are gorgeous and the music also.  I‚Äôm especially grateful for the basics taught by Jeff Warren which got me to set a habit and stay curious.

title: No more free content
review: I used this app for free when my baby was born to play lullabies, help with post partum insomnia and keep our sanity. I used to listen to one of the tracks called Milky Way- it was my favorite. These were free and required no trial or purchase. It‚Äôs all I wanted and guess what, those are LOCKED now. Very disappointed. Some people have a budget and can‚Äôt afford the full version but now there is nothing left at all to use -even for free- even things that were once free within the app. Will be uninstalling and hoping Bored Panda will be enough for me and the baby to sleep.

title: Get some sleep!
review: I downloaded calm because I‚Äôve always had a difficult time falling asleep. I‚Äôve been using calm for 3 days and I‚Äôve been able to fall asleep within minutes of my head hitting the pillow. That never happens! 5 stars for sure! To anyone who struggles with insomnia like I did, I highly recommended downloading this app!

title: But there are many many apps that are free
review:
Yes ! except  there are so many white noise apps out there at no cost  or very modest price point. 
Basically I  discovered only the app itself is a free download.   I was curious  as to content   Does it have anything  not available elsewhere?
No it doesn‚Äôt.   If I was a professional in a field where this app would  be useful I  agree it‚Äôs probably worth a subscription. I‚Äôm sorry , though  for the person just looking  for occasional ‚Äú calm ‚Äú or ‚Äú  deep sleep  the free apps. Do just as nicely.

title: Love it!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
review: I love calm it‚Äôs so awesome, I don‚Äôt have premium but I still love it without the extra cash.  It really helps me get into the mine set of meditating and to fall asleep at night. I don‚Äôt think you really need the premium unless you do a lot of meditating, I‚Äôm really just a beginner. üòÇ I‚Äôve told friends about the app and they approve of it as well. All around it‚Äôs a good app!

title: Just the right thing!
review: I‚Äôve been enjoying CALM for about 18 months!  It is a great guide for helping me stay on my meditation practice. If I miss a few days, it literally calls me back because I miss the inner peace I gain with each session. Also, it‚Äôs a wonderful addition to my morning devotion.  I highly recommend it. A friend recommended it to me and I‚Äôm better for it.

title: So relaxing

If you have 70 dollars a year, you can have the whole app. Maybe just make a bit more open to the people who can't pay, otherwise.... amazing!

title: Not the best
review: Ok so I‚Äôve seen this app in many ads and stuff and I will say the app is nice but most of the things on there are premium and me being a teen I don‚Äôt want to spend any money on that I just want to have an app that I can a do things on the relieve my stress all the time but sense almost everything is premium, it‚Äôs hard to do anything on the app so I‚Äôm would possibly like them to just let us see what it‚Äôs like Bc if u really want people to not be stressed then don‚Äôt charge them for when they use the app.

title: Very nice It good during COVID-19
review: This is a good app and I‚Äôm very glad because my parents have been fighting a lot and it helps me lots and this helps me calm down when my little sister is yelling a lot This is the best app of calming down during a pandemic I love this app I recommend it!This was written by a eight year old and anyone can read this review Hope you like it to

title: Awesome app! Wind in the Willows.
review:
Dear Calm people, 
 I love Your App. I use it every night to help me sleep. I would listen to the three free kids sleep stories before my mom paid the subscription. Now I can listen to any of them over and over again. Sincerely,

title: Nicely Modeled
review: The App is nicely worked on but I was we wouldn‚Äôt have to pay every month just one payment, something like that. (I won‚Äôt make this long) Also, yes it did make me fall alders, unfortunately though my sister woke me up as soon As I was about to start resting my body. title: Sad that only the 7 day trial is free
review:
I think at a time where the majority of our country (USA) is on lockdown  due to this pandemic - that ppl anxieties are on high levels & so many are going through financial burdens - apps like this still charge ppl to use - I personally feel that this mind healing app should be free - I understand that the makers have to make their money but I understand also that this is a time where humanity should matter more - I‚Äôm just saying! 

Peace - Love & Light to all

title: Sound Attack
review:
I have bad anxiety and was having a bit of a breakdown during class one time. I opened the app to try and calm myself (during my professors presentation) and it started playing it‚Äôs nature sounds SO VERY LOUD. This of course only added to my anxiety and did not help at all! This app normally helps to calm me down but not this time. 

I recommend to the maker of this app to have an option for sound either on or off as soon as the app is opened. Thanks.

title: Really helps!
review: I have panic attacks which has now turned into panic disorder and nighttime is especially hard for me. I find that Calm has really helped me find some piece of true inner calm. I play a bedtime story anytime I feel uneasy going to bed and they‚Äôve all lulled me to sleep perfectly! It‚Äôs definitely a fantastic tool to add to my toolbox to get through this ‚Äúbump in the road‚Äù.

title: App is nice but trying to cancel is near impossible
review: I‚Äôm not trying to take away from this wonderful app, however, I simply can not afford the subscription cost. I‚Äôve made multiple attempts to cancel this subscription yet been charged multiple times. I uninstalled this app, I‚Äôve done everything suggested to do to cancel. When I go into google play store it has the option to resubscribe so why am I still being charged?

title: An excellent introduction & maintenance tool
review:
Instead of reading a lengthy book to learn how to meditate, Calm lets you learn in small chunks, AS you practice.

Consistent practice is the key to getting the benefits of mindfulness meditation. Calm helps you stay on track with that as well.

I use it and I‚Äôve bought lifetime subs for myself and my daughter. Cant give higher praise than that.

title: App is overwhelming
review:
Calm is a very overwhelming app. For a place that one is supposed to go to for relaxing, it has caused me anxiety on several occasions because I'm not sure where to go within the app. There are too many things going on and too many categories.
The content is the best in the world but there is so much to sift through before picking something.
I really wish the app gets re organized into simpler categories for someone to easily navigate and find what they need.

title: Hate the update
review: I have listened to 336 hours on the Calm app. I absolutely love it. But the newest update is horrible! It‚Äôs hard to find my favorites, and when I do.... it shows maybe 5. The new layout just feels like chaos and I much preferred the last one. It‚Äôs hard to search through now and I barely open my app anymore. I used to use it every single night but I‚Äôm just THAT annoyed with the stinking layout. Not sure if I‚Äôll renew my subscription

title: Good content, poor app
review: I love Calm and the content they offer is great, but the app needs an overhaul. It launches and runs slowly, and it drains my phone and iPad batteries quickly while it‚Äôs open. Navigation could use some work too. The competing apps do not suffer these issues. I have resorted to using Calm from the web browser. It‚Äôs a better experience. I have raised my concerns about app performance to customer service, and they didn‚Äôt seem to care.

title: Frequent issues. These need to be fixed!
review:
Your app is not working. It‚Äôs been frozen like this all morning. 

It‚Äôs stuck on the opening page that says, ‚ÄúTake a deep breath‚Äù. Ok. And...?

Frustrating.

Calm seems to be having a lot of issues. It‚Äôs crashed quite a bit from time to time. It‚Äôs slow to load... The unreliability doesn‚Äôt only mean it‚Äôs not usable when I need it, it‚Äôs also aggravating, esp. after repeated failed attempts to use the app. 

Doesn‚Äôt help that Calm doesn‚Äôt make it easy to reach out for help or even to provide feedback. 

The irony: I‚Äôm finding myself annoyed when I‚Äôm looking to the app to get to a place of calm & relaxation. 

This is not what Premium members signed up to pay for.  Are you even aware of the problem? Are you fixing it?

title: Great able / please fix ableist context
review: I do really love this app. Just wanted to point out that in your 7 days of gratitude meditation there is a part about being grateful for your eye sight because not everyone has it. Please be aware that blind folks are able to access/use this app and it‚Äôs inappropriate ableist language. Maybe update the language in that one. Otherwise fantastic and calming, grounding app.

title: Love the app
review: I use this app almost every single night but within the last 4 days it has been glitching out like crazy and won‚Äôt even open. I have a premium subscription so this has been bumming me out as this app helps me during the day if I need a check in and lulls me off the sleep at night. Please help!

title: Suggestion
review: I really love the app. One thing I wish could change is the ‚Äútime played out of app‚Äù. It goes from nothing (0 minutes) to 15 minutes. I wish there was a 5 minute option. It‚Äôs like right when the meditation is done boom you‚Äôre done. Kind of jarring. But the 15 minutes is just to long for those using this before getting ready for work.

title: Great content but lacking basic features
review: Calm‚Äôs sleep stories has been wonderful for helping me sleep but the app is missing really basic features like playlists or search. Would love the ability to play a playlist of multiple in a row. Often I wake up when one ends but then when I start another, my husband wakes up. There should also be a way to search for stories by the same person.

title: Simply the best
review: I have been using Calm for well over a year. It took a number a starts and stops but it is now a daily practice for me. Before using Calm I more or less dismissed the practice of meditation as ‚Äúnot worthwhile‚Äù.  I now view it as an absolute essential to my mental, physical, and spiritual well being.  It builds with repetition and practice.  I highly recommend it

title: Calm
review: Marvelous tool. Very easy to use and perfect for mindful exercises. It can be used ANY time for sleep stories, meditation, soothing sounds. An incredible way to find peace and calm in this crazy world. I am very fortunate that my health care provider, Kaiser Permanente, has supported me with this app at no cost. I know there is a free version and have no doubt it would be beneficial as well. Thank you CALM!

title: My favorite app!
review:
I don‚Äôt need a sleeping pill anymore! I just play a sleep story and I‚Äôm asleep before it‚Äôs finished! I use it every night and can‚Äôt imagine not having it. I often play a story in the middle of the night when I wake up also. 
I highly recommend trying this for yourself if you have trouble sleeping like I used to.

title: Meditation first aid.
review: I have meditated before but have fallen away from it. This app got me back to meditation and gives me a gentle nudge to stick with it.  My current job is somewhat terrifying, working in a helicopter inspecting power lines. Meditation brings me focus and calm while at work, and in my home life trying to be a good partner. Thank you for keeping my head clear and calm.

title: Outstanding customer service!
review: The customer service I received from Calm is excellent. I had questions regarding different fees associated with the app and programs for teachers to use in the classroom. Two service reps, Max and Jackie, patiently answered my questions and help me set up the program I needed. I look forward to using Calm for a long time to come!

title: Membership
review: I Love the app! It has some amazing content on there but the app tricks you into thinking your starting a daily meditation series but it really is just a trial of the first day. Plus most programs are locked. If you want an experience, any experience, you would have to join the membership! Overall it‚Äôs a great consult and you should for sure try it but definitely consider the membership if you want to do anything on the app.

title: OMG! LOVE IT!‚ù§Ô∏è
review: I‚Äôm a type of kid that can‚Äôt fall asleep fast, so I downloaded this app, and, WOW! All I need to say is WOW!ü§ó I just got this today and I looked at a lot of the sleep sounds, and bedtime story‚Äôs, and they all sound so calm, and gentle. I really recommend this app to all the people that have trouble sleeping! I really appreciate that the makers of this game put a lot of hard work into it, I‚ÄôM IN LOVE WITH IT!üòç Thank you.

title: Helpful
review: I have never been into meditation but after living under enormous stress for many periods in my life I decided to try Calm. It had been recommended by a friend. It has been extremely helpful to me. Sleeping has always been a problem and the sleep stories put me right back to sleep. I highly recommend trying this app. You may find a huge difference in your life.

title: Amazing caring professionals
review:
Everyone that teaches on calm are all helpful and amazing. I have no regrets with buying this app, this has helped me through tons of life issues that has built up.  
I want to thank Jeff Warren in particular for helping with life situations he is by far one of my favorites on calm. 

Thankyou calm for helping all of us get through hard times.

title: Charge without notice
review: Be very careful that they would try to sneakily charge your subscription fee without any notice. No email reminder of upcoming subscription renewal, and very hard to find where to cancel the subscription. And of course, couldn‚Äôt find anywhere to submit the request for a refund. I will work with the credit company to get my money back but just want to leave a comment to warn other users, they are definitely trying hard to not make you aware of your upcoming payment. Horrible customer service.

title: Be aware they renew subscription without notice until it‚Äôs done
review: Received free year and didn‚Äôt realize they would automatically renew.  Tried it a couple of times but it added nothing to my meditation practice so deleted app.  Received notice today that the subscription renewed with no notice. You are expected to track it.  Unsubscribed after the fact and there is no way to get my money back as far as I can tell. disgusted.  Stuck with a subscription I won‚Äôt use and haven‚Äôt used for almost the entire year.  Sleazy.

title: Awesome, Amazing, And Wonderful! üåπ‚ú®üòä
review:
I fall asleep to this all the time! I love this app! I‚Äôd give it a 5 star rating! Everyone is says ‚ÄúI need new voices!‚Äù But the voices are fine! I think there pretty and calming. And my favorite voice is Tamara Levitt. Her voice is just so soothing üòå And over all I don‚Äôt think there should be anything to fix. This is an amazing app! You guys should get it! ‚ù§Ô∏è
‚ò∫Ô∏è
üôè

title: What is going on
review: I have loved this app and use it daily for several years and have given it as gifts... Now when I try to get in I am able to login and then I get this advertising business and wanting me to sign up again ...what is going on I wanted to go to bed and listen to a sleep story this is ridiculous ????

title: Good, But some suggestions
review: I think this app is a nice way to get a lot of stuff off your mind, but i am not old enough to spend money on premium, so almost EVERYTHING cost‚Äôs money when it really should not, i get that you need to make money, and i understand, But mabye for premium just make less things cost money, or mabye get rid of it all together? Because i have listened to almost every sound and story on here, and there is a lot more.

title: Broken with update please fix
review:
Stuck at take a deep breath screen. Same as everyone else. 

Not sure why they‚Äôre handling this individually and having people contact support as this is a universal problem with the latest update. 

As a premium subscriber for over 4 years now (probably longer) I‚Äôd appreciate a dev response to everyone on steps their taking (or at least an ACKNOWLEDGEMENT the problem exists?!) calm is usually very good about issues that have come up in the past so I‚Äôm a little surprised at the lackluster or completely lacking response.
developerResponse: {'id': 21407270, 'body': 'So sorry for the trouble you\'ve experienced! Please try leaving the app open on the loading screen, as this should allow the app to fully load.
