title: Saving my mind
review:
I have been using this app for almost 2 years. I‚Äôve recommended to loved ones, friends, even clients, it‚Äôs wonderful. Tamara Levitt‚Äôs voice is absolutely calming, the music transports you from your crisis to peace so you can refocus on reality even while working (it‚Äôs amazing what raindrops on leaves can do).
I do love and appreciate this app.  Thank you..

title: False advertisement
review: Literally have to pay to listen to anything other than like 4 stories per section. Why advertise that it‚Äôs free if it‚Äôs literally an app where you have to pay (according to a paying customer of yours) 5 dollars a month if you‚Äôre gonna make people pay that much a month why not just make the whole app accessible with a purchase of just 5 dollars I‚Äôd rather this be a free app with ads on the sidelines than an app where you have to be constantly paying to use it when it‚Äôs advertised as free. Wish I could give it 0 stars

title: No Free Content
review: I‚Äôve never downloaded an app that had absolutely nothing free. My doctor said Kaiser had some deal where the app is free but I can‚Äôt find any place to log in for that and it gave me one free session the day I downloaded it of which was supposed to be 7 days of something but it won‚Äôt let me do Day 2 or Day 3. I found Aura, it‚Äôs a similar meditation app and you get a daily moment and nighttime meditation for free. It‚Äôs a much better app IMO and it seems their full version is cheaper than this one and you actually get a feel of their content with the free service.

title: Loved the App!
review: But could you include more emojis for the mood check in!  I would do my mood check and look at the emojis and say, ‚Äúthat‚Äôs not quite what I‚Äôm feeling but oh well I‚Äôll pick this one.‚Äù  Pinpointing my mood/feeling would help customize the right mediation for the moment!  Also, it would be GREAT if Calm was Alexa enabled!  One more thing.... a JOURNAL!   I‚Äôm just saying!

title: There's room for improvement
review:
I love everything about this app but I wish we have the right to single handedly delete a particular file available offline and not all files
E.g. I wanna delete a particular music file that's offline but I can't do that, I must have to delete ALL MUSIC FILES that's offline

Please add this feature
Thanks

title: Eight hours of sleep
review: I have been getting three to four hours of sleep for weeks. The first time I used this and kept it on all night I was able to sleep eight hours something I have not done for a long time. Every time I would wake up I was able to fall back to sleep. Thank you for this app.

title: This app was better when it was free
review:
Pretty much everything on this app can only be accessed through a paid membership. I understand you have celeb collabs now, which is great, but how bout including those in the paid membership instead of giving people 1 or 2 things to listen to for free. Over half the stuff you have on this app can be found on YT. Ppl are downloading this app as a convenience to then be let down by limited access to basic features.
Advice:
Upload more FREE content.

title: Love the Calm app!
review: The Calm app has taken my meditation to the next level. It gives me the push I need to sit down and take the time to meditate each day even if it‚Äôs only for five minutes. I also love the sleep stories. If I‚Äôm having trouble sleeping at all, I put one on and the calming voices and gentle stories distract my ruminations and help me fall off to sleep.

title: Self Esteem
review: I really enjoy this session. It helps me reinforce my Steadfast approach to tackle any challenges I face with this ever changing culture of the new normal way to adapt during Global Pandemic of living an Essential Valuable Worker who has to face this changing scenario every time he steps out the door to leave for work everyday. It calms me down before I turn into bed every night.

title: Makes me nervous not calm
review:
I downloaded the app and my blood pressure shot up 10 points. I opened it and made an account, paid a fee, another 10 points. I logged in and heard awful unstoppable chirping noises, and faced 100,000 different ‚Äúcalming‚Äù things I have to add to my to do list, plus something called ‚Äúmental fitness‚Äù. By this point I‚Äôm in a full blown panic attack slash hypertensive crisis. Where does the Calm happen? This app is frustration personified!

Update: after another 10 minutes in the app I can‚Äôt make it shut up with that headache-making cricket noise. Minus a star.

title: Best on Market
review:
I have been using this app for a couple of years to manage my stress and anxiety. I have been to doctors who prescribed me medicine, and it only made matters worse for me. The calm app builds my mindfulness, and helps me manage my stress and anxiety for my life situations. 

The sleep section of the app is worth the subscription alone, and the app all around is must have.. BEST ON MARKET

title: This is the best app
review: I‚Äôve been meditating for year but i am surprised to find that i am enjoying the guided content plus the added bonuses. I writing this after Kygo releases his calming music playlist on here - love it. The app helps me be more consistent with my practice, and the annual sunk cost motivates me to use this app a lot. Worth every penny - invest $6 a month to your mental wealth.

title: Good app, but nothing is free.
review: I haven‚Äôt tried any of the products, but I imagine that if I had the money, it‚Äôd be a great app. Don‚Äôt be fooled. Nothing is free except for one breathing exercise. The only payment option is $80 a year. I kind of had a feeling this app was geared towards people who make good money. I really only wanted to download it to see more of the affirming and anxiety-managing quotes they keep showing on social media.

title: The Best App I Own
review: I‚Äôm an individual who worries more than they should, always wants things perfect, and how I prioritize my time has always been out of whack. I was also prescribed adderall for my Adult ADHD, but ever since I started using this app, the stress and worry has begun to disappear, and my focus has been better than ever. Truly my favorite app of all time.

title: Best meditation & mindfulness app ever!
review: There‚Äôs not a better app out there for guided meditation and mindfulness. I‚Äôve used the app for several years now & have learned so much. This app is incredibly user-friendly, you don't have to have any experience with meditation to get right into it. The voice is very calm, study, and confident. The free exercises in meditation & mindfulness are great.

title: Premium
review: Calm is an amazing app!!! I have only been using it for a couple of days, but I already feel better. However, premium is extremely expensive and as far as I can tell other than the first free week, you can only buy a year, you can just buy a week or a month. If you would add smaller premium time frames and lowered the price a little, or added a few more free things this would be a five star app!

title: Good app, but you have to pay to listen
review: Everytime you open the app an ad pops up telling you to get calm premium. Which at first it‚Äôs not that bad. Just an ad. But then as you‚Äôre trying to find a meditation to listen to all of them are locked until you buy the premium version which is 70 dollars per year!! You find one! But! It‚Äôs only the first out of the series that is free. So really pointless unless you‚Äôre willing to pay.

title: Very calming, you got the job done!
review: I actually just started this app only a week ago and I totally love this app, the breathe-&-hold technique really helps me realize what I‚Äôm feeling at the moment and can calm down. The only reason I didn‚Äôt give it 5 starts is because i wish you had alittle bit more options to have even though your not a ‚Äúpremium member‚Äù. But I really like this app!! Thanks!!

title: Beginners!!!!!!!
review: This app is amazing!!!! I‚Äôm a single mother, with three children. Parenting, work, school, finances,   puberty stages with my oldest two can be excessively overwhelming and stressful. I have a long way to go with rerouting my thoughts, actions, (( and heart :/)) but with the help of this app I feel greater will come and bloom me into a new, refreshed, loving, caring, and positive human being I was destined to be! Come join the world üåç of ‚òÆÔ∏è peace !!! ‚ù§Ô∏èü§§üòä

title: Worthless rip off
review: I thought I would just test it out and see and thought it gave you the first month free. For an app that costs $70 you would think they would give you a month before committing to such a purchase. I canceled 11 days after downloading realizing it was pointless and not helpful. Then realized I had already been charged. I am livid. I literally just threw $70 out the window for something I won‚Äôt use and would never ever use again. Don‚Äôt even bother. There are better things you can do to help yourself.

title: It save my live
review:
Seems like a full exaggeration of my part. Have been suffering of anxiety from some time ago. 

Yes, I tried meditate from myself but it was close of the guidance and direction and training this app gave to me. Tamara Levitt and Jeff Warren have been part of my wake up morning every day since October 2020. Time for Meditation It is a must in every one life.

title: Diverse voices to compliment diverse images please
review: So often in this day and age companies practice D&I by going no further than adding images of diversity to their website, app.   But when I open their content diverse voices absent. So I move on and rarely use the Calm app that I have free for one year from Kaiser because the voices all sound the same and I get the impression that the diverse voices are not being hired. Mostly white male or female. Nothing wrong but I want to have a choice to hear voices that is a reflect my culture, my needs, my soul.

title: Could be a 5 star app, except for....
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for almost 2 years. I enjoy the daily meditations except for the narrator Tamara Levitt. Her tone is condescending and patronizing, plus she can‚Äôt stop talking. She‚Äôs a huge distraction. She does a good job of writing the meditations, but Calm needs to find other mediation leaders. Come on Calm give us a choice for daily meditation.

title: Calm is insipid and stresses me out
review: I have no idea how I got cornered into buying an entire year‚Äôs subscription for an app I don‚Äôt want or use. The so-called music is worse than being in an elevator or on hold with a customer service line - insipid and soulless are the words that come to mind and I am personally surprised that some of the musicians I admire actually put their names on here. Of course it‚Äôs impossible to cancel if you purchased via iTunes etc. and now I learn that it would have been free as a Kaiser member - would have been nice if they asked that at the very beginning!

title: Simple Self care
review: Starting my morning with a 10-15 minute meditation and stretch sets a nice rhythm for the day ahead. I‚Äôm more prepared to walk steady through my day. Arrows bounce away, I‚Äôm able to be much more present and thought-ful. My blood pressure is lower and I‚Äôm able to respond with a clear mind.  Overall my mind and body feel better.

title: Wow
review:
Heard a lot about this app and was hesitant to try, so I‚Äôm SO GLAD I did. It helps me with my anxiety and also my anger issues. 
After deciding that I didn‚Äôt want to face the horrible side effects of ssri‚Äôs anymore, I decided to try something different to help with my depression and mood swings. 
I‚Äôm 32 and I‚Äôve been struggling for almost 20 years now. ‚ÄúCalm‚Äù is a Game Changer!

title: amazing!
review: from the night I got this I didn‚Äôt really think it would work that well. After reading the reviews I thought well I‚Äôll give it a try! I got it and then I fell asleep to the first story. After that I have been sound asleep after story‚Äôs and story‚Äôs! I definitely recommend the premium it‚Äôs worth it!

title: Love but stop with celebs
review: I love this app, but stop with continuing to add celebrities. It‚Äôs nice to listen to a neutral voice and not someone I can place in a movie, a song or have an opinion about. That in itself gives me anxiety. Can we not have anything without celebs infiltrating, now even an app, that is supposed to calm us? This will determine if I continue paying a lot of money for this app. I don‚Äôt want it going to already very rich celebs. I pay the money to help CALM me neutrally.

title: I love this app!
review: I love this app, because it has truly helped me so much. My anxiety has gotten so much much better, i feel like I can handle everyday with more ease than ever before! The only criticism I have is I wish there were more diversity in the narrators, I honestly don‚Äôt like listening to Tamara so I wish I had more options with that.

title: Thank You
review: I love this app. I wasn‚Äôt sure I would and at first it felt kind of funny listening each morning, but the more I do it the more it helps. Each morning I listen, and each morning, the topic resonates with me in some way. I‚Äôve started asking my husband and my kids to listen with me and they love it, too! Thank you.

title: Wow ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞
review: Okay if you are willing to pay a lot so you can finally fall asleep.I totally recommend this the only bad thing is....they are so peaceful and their voices are so calming that I never get to finish the story ü§£ü§£I recommenced the velveteen rabbit . Overall great app totally recommend helped me fall asleep when I haven‚Äôt been able to fall asleep in weeks üëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

title: AMAZING
review: this app is absolutely amazing! it put me to sleep so fast and so easily. this app is so calming and i definitely recommend. one thing that could be fixed is the fact that you have to pay $ yearly to unlock everything. hope that is fixed so everyone can use all of this apps amazing features!

title: Terrible bugs
review:
The goal of this App is to gain CALM. After TEN FAILED attempts to get the app to open and continue playing, I am beyond frustrated and not the LEAST BIT CALM!!! I open the App, it tries to boot up but then disappears and the screen reverts to its original. Night after night I have this issue. I‚Äôve just downloaded a white noise app that will hopefully work far better and more reliably than this hideous operation. 
I need a new app to become ‚ÄúCalm‚Äù after dealing with this calamitous excuse of an app. How ironic. I‚Äôve wasted almost half an hour dealing with it..

title: Calming
review: The woman speaking in this has a beautiful voice and sets an almost perfect president of natural calmness. With her tonality she can sooth a persons mind and relax all kinks in the neck (even the shoulder or back). There‚Äôs power in the voice of a woman like that, enough to make you want to listen. You have to hear it for yourself. Certainly eases the mind off of the mundane. 5/5 with 100%

title: Improve your life, day, moment
review: Excellent 3 min or 45 min or however long you want to strengthen your ability to focus your mind, exercises. Calm is a perfect name because that‚Äôs what it does for you. No matter how turmoiled is your mind, this will bring an increasing level of calm in proportion to how you practice with it. I use this in conjunction with a Vedanta practice. Sanyo, santi, santi

title: Don‚Äôt Sign up for Trial
review:
Unless you really want to subscribe for a whole year...
I tried once and realized it wasn‚Äôt what I needed (overall good app, just not for me). I made a point to unsubscribe before my 1 week trial was expired, but got a charge the morning of my final day that my card was already run and charged. I cancelled right away and contacted Apple, to learn ‚Äúpayments are processed 24 hours before the renewal date.‚Äù
So lesson learned: never assume a 7-day trial is actually 7 days, but that is deceitful and misleading. Now I‚Äôm out $75 with an app I won‚Äôt use.

title: Really
review: No matter if it‚Äôs the best app I would never take advise from LeBron James. Calm get real and stand on your own and stop thinking celebrities endorsements will help. If your app is truly solid you don‚Äôt need stupid celebrities.  Folks be your own person and tell these companies you don‚Äôt need to be influenced by celebrities. You‚Äôre no less better than LeBron James.

title: Great, but only in the beginning
review:
Calm is a fantastic app, with many features that help you learn and practice mindfulness. There‚Äôs one problem though: Premium.

Calm Premium gives you access not to a lot more content, like the app claims, but basically everything. You can basically do nothing but play the music. Then why do I need calm? This makes users think that the state of mind that mindfulness creates must be bought. This, in my opinion, is something that will negatively impact how we see mindfulness.

title: Peaceful mind, calm body
review:
The Calm App has helped me deal with anxiety. I  enjoy all the different applications. Easy to use and very key for people who have never meditated. I also love the sleep stories for those nights when you need some help falling asleep. I use it everyday at least 3 or 4 times. It is essential to my well being.
MarTorres

title: So helpful!
review: Calm app- has been along this journey of mines when it comes to anxiety, stresses of life, depression etc. I‚Äôm still learning but with the help of meditation and just truly existing in the present and not being so hard on myself (which I can be) this app has been so helpful! Thankful to have come across this app when I did ü¶ã

title: Best all around
review: I have several meditation apps, but I keep coming back to Calm because it has the best sleep stories for me (it‚Äôs all about the voice of the narrator), wonderful meditation series with helpful tools to track or personalize your meditation, thoughtful talks, and music. I had it now for 3 years and I am amazed how it has grown and is expanding.

title: No customer service. Unhappy with purchase
review: I started using this app when it first came out. I thought I‚Äôd try out the subscription and accidentally purchased the lifetime version (good til 3017!?) for a womping $300+ one-time payment! I was intending on paying like $2-3 MAX. I contacted the app and trying fixing the issue and they never responded. Mind you, the app is mediocre at best. The paid for app isn‚Äôt really any better than the free version. I‚Äôve only used it a handful of times since 2017...but I‚Äôm stuck apparently. For forever. I feel the opposite of calm using it now.

title: Pricy and not calming
review: I wanted this to be a good app. I was attracted to the bedtime stories feature to help get the mind ready for sleep. I wasn‚Äôt super keen that they try to lock you in for a whole year for $70, but I continued with the trial period. My first bedtime story had a lot of political undertones and instead of calming my mind, it turned my brain back on. If you have an overactive mind that you are trying to distract for sleep, I found that the developers have done a poor job screening their stories for appropriate content.

title: Probably the best app in the store
review:
I dont usually write reviews, but this is my first day of going premium and boy... did it change my life. Be ready to change though only ways things will take effect. 

I don‚Äôt pay for apps but this is 100% worth. Will update with a new review if things change

title: Scam
review: I have literally never written a review for anything, but this made me so angry I needed to. As many others have said, this app basically forces you into a subscription‚ÄîI didn‚Äôt even realize it had accessed my card info through my iTunes until I got a notification from my bank tonight of a $60 charge. I guess the app had decided that was the option I wanted, and charged me behind my back even though I‚Äôd never given them my payment info. I am livid. I used it one time and shut it, and now I‚Äôve been charged $60 that I don‚Äôt have.

title: It helps
review: I love this app so much it helps me go to sleep but most of the things that I am interested in I can‚Äôt do because there‚Äôs a premium unlock that I have to do and I don‚Äôt wanna waste that much money just for money but except for that I really really really really really like this app I suggest you should get it if you haven‚Äôt

title: Been Using This A Long Time
review: after a recent update, after the daily meditation, ends the soothing background sounds end also.  Wish the background sounds would continue like they used to.  The abrupt stop in background interrupts my meditation which lasts just a little longer.

title: Crashes or Freezes iPad
review: Just installed app with Premium sub and I really like the content. But. Touching the photos in the app caused them to scatter all over my screen. Then word bubbles in the app did the same thing. Reboot to clear the screen. Then. Opening Safari and entering ‚ÄúCalm‚Äù to find out about the company brought up the app and then froze Safari. Wouldn't let go. Half hour later I had to reboot. iPad is less than two years old. iOS 13.5.1. A meditation app should not be annoying.

title: Unlock more items in each category.
review: I feel as if more of everything should be unlocked. Not all of it but only a few of everything instead of all of it being locked to where people who aren‚Äôt subscribed can still get a better experience and that experience making them want to subscribe.

title: Wife loves and uses app
review: My wife put this app on my phone because she liked it on hers and before you knew it, I was committed to a one year sub. I haven‚Äôt opened this app once in the past 10 months and it has set me back about $70. Kudos for creating an app that my wife likes and uses; boo because I couldn‚Äôt get my money back for an app that I have no interest in using and don‚Äôt want.

title: A MUST!!! üòç
review: Even on those days you just don‚Äôt wanna...take 10 minutes for yourself to reset. I use it for anxiousness, my other half for relaxation, our 8yr old fall‚Äôs asleep with restlessness to the kids app and our 22yr old enjoys it just to maintain happiness. Use & enjoy this gift as a family or as you‚Äôre own personal new favorite thing.

title: Love it but to much locked
review: I LOVE this app don‚Äôt get me wrong it REALLY helps me and is the ONLY app that helps me sleep but I think there is to much locked and I think they should let you be able to listen to stuff for free and yes I get it the app needs money so I get why you have to pay but I just think there should be free sections to where you don‚Äôt have to pay to listen all the time but other than that it is the best sleeping app I have ever used! No hate :)

title: Great app except for one thing
review:
Calm is a great app it got me asleep in seconds but everything is premium like the free stuff theirs only one episode of the whole thing that is free. I want to save money but it‚Äôs kinda ridiculous that I only get one episode out of like 40 episodes. But I love the app I just wish it wasn‚Äôt all premium. 

Thanks 
By Jake

title: App keeps crashing
review:
While I love the content the app crashes when I am listening to sleep stories. Had to restart stories 4 times last night. Kinda defeats the purpose don‚Äôt you think? I went from five stars to three because of this problem. I cannot find a way to communicate with you other than a review. 

Here‚Äôs hoping you read these reviews and fix the problem soon.

Thank you

title: Love this app but could be better
review:
I absolutely love this app but there are some improvements that could be made. 

1. Why can‚Äôt you favorite a sleep story or meditation without playing it first??
2. Why can‚Äôt you cue up sleep stories? On Apple Music you have the option to select ‚Äúplay next‚Äù on songs, it would be nice if sleep stories had something similar..

title: I like this app
review: I downloaded this app to help me calm down all my racing emotions. There is some really useful things in this app but the only thing I would say is a pain is that things are locked. What I mean is that you have to pay to be premium and then you can get more things, I wish that everything was unlocked because I don‚Äôt want to have to pay,

title: Inconsistent quality
review:
This would be a great app if it worked.

It sounds so simple, you listen to tracks related to meditation or something related. Yet, it often does not play the audio. Or it doesn‚Äôt list offline content. There always seems to be something that doesn‚Äôt work right with this app. 

Please invest in quality control before pushing your updates. I can‚Äôt use your app if it doesn‚Äôt work.

title: Derek‚Äôs Calm Review
review: I stumbled upon this app, and to say in its short time with me has been life changing would be an understatement! I have set daily routines that are putting my mind in the right state to help me along my new journeys that life has presented me! I recommend anyone who looks for inspiration both mentally and spiritually, to have Calm by their side daily!

title: Can‚Äôt log in so what good is it
review: They won‚Äôt expand their bandwidth or whatever they need to do to accommodate new users. I have been a customer for over a year and a half I can no longer login because the site is overwhelmed and crashes.   So disgusted, I hope the competition eats them alive.

title: I really enjoy this app but...
review:
I forgot to cancel and now I am stuck paying $79 or whatever dollars... luckily I do enjoy the app and I will have to remind myself that I need to cancel before the get charged again. 

I don‚Äôt think that this app is worth $79 a year what-so-ever. It‚Äôs nice, but I literally would never spend that much on an app ever üòë

title: Great app just one little thing...
review: So... I usually listen to the rain noises but, every once in a while I‚Äôll listen to a bed time story and I have to turn my volume down by a lot when I do, I don‚Äôt wake up to my alarm. I wish you could adjust the noise of the bed time story‚Äôs like you can the noises other that that great app! Ô£ø

title: Such a relaxing app
review: I have used another meditation app but I swear this app is the first app that I‚Äôve used that made me feel totally relaxed! My second session I totally felt like I was out of my body somewhere drifting!! I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs the calmness of the waves but it makes me happy inside!! I feel loved!! I love myself after this app lol

title: Great idea, poorly executed
review: I mean this app in general is a fantastic idea. With the sounds, the different backgrounds, the stories and more. The only downside is that you have you pay out a fat yearly fee. I get that the developers want to make money but why don‚Äôt you give an option on how to pay (i.e., month to month which would be 5-6 dollars). If you are looking for a sound or calming app try ‚ÄòRain Rain‚Äô completely free, but beware that there is not a mediation ‚Äúbreathe in breathe out‚Äù setting on that app.

title: Outstanding Delivery
review:
I‚Äôve used calm on 2 occasions and have become stronger fan. The meditation features deliver great ways to relieve stress and relax a lot better without hitting booze or drinking a bottle of wine. The sleep portion works like a charm. I‚Äôve used the waterfall and rain drops on the window to get some much deserve sleep! 

I will be recommending this app to friends and family!

title: Love this.
review:
I love this app. I use it every day, even if it‚Äôs just the sound thundering rain storms (they help my partner sleep better) and the meditation is a great help

Only 2 things are keeping me from giving it 5 stars:
1) its been crashing more often or freezing up completely. 
2) it‚Äôs a minor one, but I‚Äôm really tired of seeing Matthew McConaugheys face every time I open the sleep stories.

title: Hope there‚Äôs more subscription options
review: I didnt expect much but at one glance it‚Äôs better than any other similar apps. But I hope there‚Äôs more options instead of just 1 year subscription. That‚Äôs what‚Äôs holding me back from purchasing pro version. Hope this message reaches the company.

title: Great but pricey
review:
Can you put a price on relaxation? Calm did. I‚Äôd give this app 5 stars if it had a monthly option. $70 is a little much for trying something new. 

As far as the app. It works great. Bedtime is exciting now as I look forward to a new story instead of reading bad things on the news. Meditation is amazing and taking time to do nothing in today‚Äôs world is like a mini vacation.

title: The daily calm meditations
review: Everyday they have a different topic for guided meditation that always ties into something that we all struggle with on life. The guided meditations are helpful. They also have some for children and a variety of other topics. I haven‚Äôt delved into them all but this is a pretty good app for all the hype it was given during the pandemic by Kaiser staff.

title: Pretty good‚Äî just wish there were more ASMR!
review: So far my experience has been pretty great. I like some of the music, and the ambiance tracks are great. I am not a big fan of the selection of audio narratives, and wish there were more ASMR style content and more lofi-style binaural music. My favorite thing on the app is the French Whisperer‚Äôs story of Atlantis. It would be great to have more history content.

title: Calm
review: When I said in silence and do my breathing exercise I feel better mobility to talk and speak a whole sentence become better and clear my mind is better my reflexes silence played a big part in my life this morning today is the first day that I‚Äôve taken out walking I walk two blocks and back home

title: This helps me fall asleep every night!
review: I pretty much have a streak of listening to the same sleep story every night but let‚Äôs ignore that fact and I have to say, this app is amazing, I wake up with good thoughts in my head and a great dream last night because of the things your stories make me think about! Thx so much!!!

title: Ok igüôÉüôÉ
review:
So I love this app, but there is something that needs to change. First of all I would like to point out that the per year amount is way to expensive (well to me). Also that with everything you can do, you must have premium. Which is unfair. I would like if there is more options then just your scene with the sounds...üôÉ

But overall it‚Äôs a good app.

title: New Prospective
review: After a serious issue with my back and legs and a few anxiety and panic attacks along with the worry I decided to get into meditation and stick with it this time. I have done that and the results have been exhilarating. I look forward to taking the time for myself and the guidance from CALM has been great.

title: App review
review: This app has helped me calm my mind, especially during nights when I have a hard time controlling my thinking. Apps such as these help cultivate mindfulness, which is a huge aspect to most therapy techniques. Learning how to train your mind into calmness is a very beneficial thing to learn, and is especially useful for people with anxiety disorders.

title: Need More Voice Variety
review: I love this app. It has helped me distress so much over the last week. I don‚Äôt even mind the kind of high subscription fee, because I like how many different meditations there are. BUT, I really wish there were more narrators than Tamara. Her voice isn‚Äôt that soothing, it‚Äôs kind of screechy and shrill. I would prefer if there were options to select other voices in all of the meditations like in some of the meditations.

title: [STAFF] Integration with Health app
review: To update my results in Health app after meditation I need to finish session all the way through and wait for final ending screen to update. Otherwise results are not sent to Health app. Is it possible to send data even if I leave meditation session in the middle, so at least health of the session time I can see in Health app

title: Grateful
review:
I am grateful that my daughter introduced me to this app about a year  and a half ago.  Even tho I don‚Äôt ‚Äúsign in‚Äù here everyday, it has led me back to a more prayerful life on a daily basis. My prayer includes meditation.   All of this has helped lower my blood pressure because it has helped alleviate the anger that has possessed me way too long. 
Thank you Tamara.

title: Great aesthetics so far content is pretty shallow
review: Daily Calm meditation is good until the guide tells you about her ‚Äúdeep experience‚Äù meant to be examples of the concept your meditating on - including stories about Drake (transformation) and her boyfriend‚Äôs motorcycle (communicating with loved ones). Would be more impactful if guise were someone with more significant life experience and meaningful experiences. Good enough for a shallow or young Millennial audience I guess. I will keep trying other meditations to find something I like but so far not that impressed.

title: So important, especially now
review: Then only mental health app I‚Äôve had that truly has free content that useful. They are not always pushing a premium prescription in my face, which from what I see is more amazing content. Especially in 2020, to have this app to help me meditate is everything. Definitely would recommend.

title: Best meditation app especially for beginners
review: I‚Äôve never meditated before but heard about this app and love it. The guided Daily Calm is just what I need as I wouldn‚Äôt be disciplined on my own. I love her voice and I love the various programs including the one with Lebron James and the day challenges. Even if you don‚Äôt think you can do it with this app you can.

title: Successful intro to meditation
review: I‚Äôve always found meditation to be somewhat perplexing, but the Calm app makes meditation approachable and understandable. My only critique is with the primary voice, Tamara Levitt. I find her voice to be inauthentic... like she is trying to be super cool, like a Valley girl. This makes a significant portion of the material unlistenable for me, but there are other voice options.

title: Issues
review: I enjoyed the app until one time when I was pretty deep into the meditation when the speaker Tamara Levitt started in on a story about ham.  I‚Äôm a vegan so this was pretty startling/jarring to me because I find the image of ham a little disturbing because I associate it with factory farming.  No big deal but I haven‚Äôt been back since because I don‚Äôt really trust the content to always be peaceful/mindfully chosen.  For most people though it‚Äôs probably a good meditation app.

title: I can finally fall asleep
review: I honestly can‚Äôt even tell you if the sleep stories are any good, because I always fall asleep in the first few minutes.  I‚Äôve tried listening to Matthew McConaughey‚Äôs story 5 times, but I still don‚Äôt know what it‚Äôs about, lol.  Nothing has worked for me like this.  Highly recommend.

title: Premium too expensive sorry
review: Hi so I absolutely love this app but... $70 A YEAR IS LIKE SO MUCH! I also wish there was more stuff open to people without premium. I can only listen to two sleep things and I am starting to get tired of them. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, they are good but after listening to them who knows how much it starts to drag. I would get premium but I can‚Äôt get it, too expensive. Sorry I really love the app! Every other aspect about it!

title: Disappointedü§¨
review: I have anger issues and I was downloading this to help me with my anger and anxiety but every time it would give me something to work on it would have to be money. Like are serious? If this app wanted to help people it wouldn‚Äôt cost money cause I don‚Äôt have money unfortunately but this got me really mad cause it just killed my hope. Yeah it‚Äôs calming but it should be free for people like me. It‚Äôs disappointing. very very disappointed there just like it want to help,but it‚Äôs gonna cost you‚Äô

title: I like it but...
review: I really like this app but I can only use like two of things that are on here. I don‚Äôt like how they make you pay for stuff to use more of the story things or something else. What I can use is GREAT! I would like to use more stuff on there but I can‚Äôt since it makes you pay for it( which is stupid.)  I would like to have more access to more stories or just other stuff. Other than that is is great!

title: This app is amazing! Few suggestions
review:
I LOVE this app. Just got today and was super excited! I looked at the sleep stories and realized that basically none of the stories were free. That‚Äôs a downside, One of the reasons I gave this 4 out of 5. I would have given it a five if more stuff was free, like the songs and stories! Otherwise, I love this app. Please do add more free things. I would give it 5 üåü. 

          -ThE fUnKy PoTaToE

title: 5.12.1 made calm disappear!
review: Calm you are my five star sleep routine for myself and my whole family. However, when I updated to this version all I get is a blue screen telling me to take a deep breath. Yeah, not fixing the bugs. Luckily my husband hasn‚Äôt updated his app so we can still access for now. Please fix!

title: Free version to try... good luck finding anything free..
review: I was trying this out for my Psychiatrist.  I love the options of sounds/backgrounds on your main page.  Basically everything I clicked after that required a subscription so...  I‚Äôm going to have to report back to not recommend.  We‚Äôre Cancer patients. Since everything I click on to try out requires signing up a credit card.  We out.  If in the future you offer anything on the free app I‚Äôd be happy to review again but as of now this is a failure and waste of time

title: Now becoming political. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüò•
review:
I have so enjoyed the meditations but now they are becoming political.  I just want to meditate, be present in the moment, listen to peaceful sounds, focus on positive, encouraging words and try to sleep or refresh. 

We all have our needs for identity and our battles to fight but can‚Äôt we just be human beings who need to rest or regroup for a few minutes without feeling even meditations are fomenting causes and agendas? Disappointing!

title: Great! Just a few suggestions.
review: I really enjoy the app. I think something that should be changed is, please add some free things. I understand that there aren‚Äôt many (or no) ads so you have to pay, but I think there should be a few free things in each category (meditation,music, etc.) but please leave the check ins for freeüòÖ. Other than that, it‚Äôs a great app!! ü§çü§çü§ç

title: Love calm
review: My mom sometimes puts on a calm story for me and my brother. That is where I first heard of calm. This app helps me calm down and release stress or anger. I love Bella‚Äôs Bedtime Blanket 2. It is my favorite because she time travels to go meet the Write brothers and I think that is SO COOL! Also, there are no adds which I absolutely LOVE ‚ù§Ô∏è! This app is for people between 2-98(all ages). This is why I love calm.

title: Love it but the rain won‚Äôt stop
review: Love this app, but weird new glitch is occurring where even if I don‚Äôt have the app open, the intro rain noises will suddenly start playing out of no where. It‚Äôs happened a number of times now and I can‚Äôt get it to stop unless I open up the app and force close it. This has been happening for a week now and restarting my phone does not make a difference. Super frustrating!

title: The Gift of Calm
review:
Calm has changed my life every single day.  If I say it‚Äôs made the world better. . . that is not true. It‚Äôs made me better. I see more. I feel accepting of me and then I feel acceptance of all those around me. I am the recipient of wonder and peace. . . how can I not share with those I meet? With those I care about ?
With those I love?

title: Awesome
review: This is an awesome app!  I use it everyday to meditate, to check in with how I am feeling, grateful for; etc and for stories to help me sleep.  This app has helped me keep me calm at many tense moments, especially during this crazy years.  I highly recommend; and the yearly subscription fee is low considering what you get in return.

title: But the premium
review: This is a decent sleep app. It has the sleep sounds and stories and everything. However, even though it‚Äôs designed to relive stress and anxiety, it has now become the source of my annoyance and disappointment. Whenever I get ready to go to sleep and click on some sleep music, I end up with Calm premium which is very stressful. I ended up downloading a different app with much lower prices and the same quality as this one. Please, for your claim to releasing stress, either take away premium altogether or lower the prices.

title: Several years and counting
review: I was an early Calm adopter and so glad I did. Calm helps me to be consistent in my practice. And I can have favorites as well as try new things. Some days I want to sit for more than 10 minutes. I can. And I love the guest leaders. These are the best in the field. Calm helps me make good on intentions and practice new habits.  Thanks and Namaste. üôè

title: Best app ever!!!!!!
review: I‚Äôve seen ad‚Äôs for this app on t.v. and I thought it was fake and would be a waste, but my mom started using it. So I thought I would give it a try. I have been using it every night, I‚Äôve never slept so good in my whole life! I also think the sessions are very inspirational. I really, really, really, really recommend this app!!!

title: Good app but,
review: I like this app but I dislike you want us to pay. I don‚Äôt believe we should pay money for things like mental health and such, but I do like how this app does represent its title. I understand the money thing but that doesn‚Äôt mean I like it. I hope this app will turn out even better in the future and you will continue to improve this app in the best way possible.

title: Extremely helpful
review: I have found this app to be extremely helpful in this uncertain time in the world. A friend recommended it to me and I have been doing it everyday before work.  It has helped me to focus on slowing breathing down and get into that calm headspace before I head to work in the hospital.  Highly recommend it!!!

title: I like it but...
review:
Calm is a pretty awesome & useful app. The reason I gave it only 4 stars is because the voices & intonations of Tamara Levitt & Elisha drive my ears and my hearing crazy. The way they stress and pronounce ‚Äúg‚Äù at the end of the words would affect me the opposite of relaxing. Moreover, the majority of sessions ARE by Tamara & then Elisha. Which prevents me from enjoying and taking advantage of all the sessions. ): 

My favorite voices are Oreon‚Äôs (number one) and then Tara‚Äôs. I like Malika‚Äôs as well.

title: A Must in my Daily Ritual!
review:
I love this app! It has intentional meditation themes dedicated for each day & the instructors voices are calm & soothing. Of course you can choose any topic you‚Äôd like to focus on, but I enjoy the gift of something new daily. You get to choose a default background scenery sound during your use on the app, ‚Äòraindrop on leaves‚Äô is my comfort place. 

There is a feature on my personal summary page where I can track my meditation streaks & duration, favorite meditations, & so on, this keeps me motivated to be consistent on my habit. 

Additionally, I enjoy ‚Äòthe spark‚Äô where I learn experiences and wisdom shared by various individuals.

It‚Äôs a great app & worth a try!

title: Helps me focus on me for a little while n
review: This is a wonderful app! As a teacher (especially now with the world on pause) it‚Äôs hard to not stop and take a little bit of time for yourself and these daily exercises really help me do that- even if for only 10 minutes. Thank you so much!

title: Good, but want consistent updates
review: I enjoy using this app to fall asleep, but given that it‚Äôs a pricey subscription, you‚Äôd think there would be relatively frequent additions to the sleep stories. I have not found that to be the case. Might cancel soon since I‚Äôll have gone through all the nonfiction sleep stories available.

title: Back to normal in 10 minutes.
review: I really like the daily morning meditations. They are quick and effective to start my day off right. The author has a soothing and uplifting voice. I love all the other perks too like lessons from other authors, music, & sleep meditations. This app is a huge value for what‚Äôs provided in the annual cost.

title: Helps but the cost!!
review: This really helps me relax. I feel it works better than when you are in an office. Being able to lay in bed and do on your own time is so much better than having an appointment. I only wish it could be free. As a disabled person, money is hard to come by. I tried this last night and fell asleep within 10min.

title: If you don‚Äôt subscribe you get almost nothing!
review: I like the app, I feel like it could help me sleep, if there where more than a few free stories! I know they have to make money some how, but really your going to give me a few sleep stories and some meditation ones? I really wish you could add more for the free stuff and maybe put in a button that shows all the free stories and sounds. Please respond to my review!

title: It‚Äôs relaxing, however...
review: I‚Äôve always had a hard time with anxiety and stress. Anyone could agree with that. I really do use this app every day now, but it‚Äôs kind of ridiculous that I have to pay just to ease my mind and anxiousness/stress. Especially when I‚Äôm struggling to fall asleep every night, there‚Äôs not much I can do but one out of many ‚Äúlocked‚Äù mediations. I know there‚Äôs other apps but they‚Äôre pretty much the same.

title: No Thank You
review: Unless you‚Äôre willing to pay a $69 annual subscription fee, don‚Äôt bother downloading this app. Almost all content is premium and my inbox was blown up with five emails received in the last 12 hours, including hard selling to subscribe. Calm? No, it‚Äôs rather obnoxious. I deleted the app and unsubscribed from emails.

title: Sleep
review: I‚Äôve used Calm for 2 years. The meditation and Sleep stories have changed my life. Stressful events can always happen, but I can always take ten minutes with my Calm to get centered. The sleep stories are interesting and helps a roaming mind. I highly suggest the Calm. I have several others in my circle using it.

title: Seemed lovely at first, then I realized what it was.
review: The app seemed great at first! I was extremely excited to try it, but there‚Äôs little to nothing that isn‚Äôt trapped behind a paywall. It‚Äôs perfectly understandable to have premium features, especially when you‚Äôve worked hard on an app, but there‚Äôs literally only one story that I can listen to and nothing else. I was very disappointed. Maybe consider adding a little more for people who don‚Äôt want to spend 70 dollars on your app, please.

title: Shady Business Practices
review: Most likely would have given Calm 4 or 5 stars, had I not gotten charged $90 unexpectedly. Great app and I probably would have paid for the premium plan. But they have you subscribe after downloading without telling you that they will be charging you $90 for a full year of premium. I most likely would have started on a monthly plan to see how much I really enjoyed the app before opting for the yearly plan. Very unfortunate that they feel the need to deceive potential customers to make a little extra cash.

title: This app is $70/year
review: There is absolutely ZERO free content on this app. Once you open it, it shows all of their content, but all of the content is locked. I‚Äôve been scouring this app for awhile now, and there is absolutely nothing that you can listen to for free. All there is for free is one 3.5 minute intro from LeBron James. Nothing else. I feel like the creators should notify before you download that in order to use any content, you must subscribe to their $70 per year ‚Äúpremium‚Äù service. 1 Star for complete and utter lack of transparency.

title: Calm is the best app on my phone!
review: I love everything about this app. The daily calm has been a game changer for me. I start each day with a fresh perspective and it only takes 10 minutes. I‚Äôve been doing this a little over one year and have noticed that my attitude is much better and calmer. So grateful and blessed üôè‚ù§Ô∏è‚úåüèª

title: Mediation is a breeze with this app!
review: I have always had difficulty in trying to meditate, but with the app, and their great instructors, meditating is easy and fun! The best part of all of meditating is that it can quickly be learned, and your outlook on life can change quickly. Very impressed with the quality of instruction for the price.

title: Thank you for supporting tennis player Naomi Osaka.
review:
I want to express my reaction to news that your company is supporting tennis player Naomi Osaka. I was surprised and delighted. I was reminded that your app was a tool for healing. Ironically, I put it to little use during The Pandemic. I was actually too busy ‚Äî- surviving. Now, I am resuming my practices. They are, I am reminded, part of my survival tool kit.

D

title: Changed my life for the better!
review: I started using calm at the beginning of the pandemic and it really helped me to cope. Then I discovered the master classes and the spark and the breathing exercises and it helped me to thrive. I recommend it to anyone many people whether to help them through difficulty or to support them as they evolve.

title: Despacito
review: All I can say is ,that day when you finally have time to put a pause in your life to take the breathe we all take that brings the obstacles you went through that whole week out your system check this app out cause I bet your going to take it despacito

title: Amazing app but make more of it free
review: I love this app and it helped me get rid of a lot of my stress. But I could only use it for a couple of days because of the fact that so much of it u need to pay for. I would pay for it but I‚Äôm 11 and I don‚Äôt have that kind of moneyüòÖ. So I think u should make a little more of this app free so people can partially use it with out paying.

title: Great app, but losing streaks is frustrating
review: I was fortunate to get a free year trial from my cardholder and have been enjoying the benefits. For some reason, the Calm app isn‚Äôt able to keep track of what time zone I‚Äôm in and I‚Äôve noticed that despite meditating at night sometimes, the app will register this as the next day even though the Daily Calm for the that day hasn‚Äôt been released yet. Would like this to be fixed!

title: Unreliable for long term
review: This app kept crashing and help directed me to uninstall and reinstall the app. It then worked fine for awhile until I accidentally deleted it. When I tried to reinstall it, I got a message that my device was not compatible!? That makes so sense since it was recently updated and working. I am not happy with this and will now consider uninstalling from other devices. I have not had these kinds of issues with other Apps.

title: Only 2nd day
review: The first night my husband and I listened to a bedtime story.  Both of us fell asleep before the story ended!  Tonight I started a 30- day learning how to meditate.  I‚Äôve never even tried this but the first lesson has made me look forward to tomorrow‚Äôs lesson.  We‚Äôll see. . . but it‚Äôs starting well. Calm was recommended by my doctor.

title: I might be the only one...
review: But I can‚Äôt stand Tamara Leavitt‚Äôs voice.  I find it a little too childish or something.  I can‚Äôt put my finger on it.  Anyway, the sleep stories are so effective at putting me to sleep!  I can‚Äôt believe it when I wake up and realize the story is over (and then quickly fall back asleep).  I just wish all the other stuff wasn‚Äôt mostly narrated by Tamara (though nothing against her, she seems lovely).

title: This is amazing.
review:
Ok, so for a while I wasn‚Äôt sleeping all that well, so I tried a few meditative apps and so far, Calm is my favorite. I love the music and stories, the daily check- ins, meditations and just everything on this app. 
PS, If you are a fan of meditation, also try Endel and Headspace. They also are great apps. Still, Calm is my favorite. Try it out! üòÅ

title: From a Therapist
review: As a therapist and a person living in such difficult times, this is one my many tools to come back home to this moment. I teach meditation & practice it. The Calm app is my go to.  The stories, the music, the meditations, & inspiration.  I‚Äôve tried a few others & I find this one lives up to its name.

title: Anxiety disorder
review: My anxiety has been at an all time high and i never thought these apps worked but I finally downloaded calm and it is my saving grace. If I go to bed with anxiety or wake up with it I know calm will ground me and I will feel more relaxed and able to sleep. I can‚Äôt recommend this enough or talk about it enough.

title: Great app

My issue: Most of the stories are around 30 minutes, which is long enough to put me to sleep. But then I often awaken when they end and have to manually restart or start a different one, which means more interrupted sleep.

My request: Please please please add either a playlist option or continuous play feature and/or more anthologies. 

Thank you üôèüíó

There is so many great features in this app and I love all the reminders to smile during meditation.

I love this app especially that it doesn‚Äôt ask how did that make you feel at the end of each meditation like a lot of other apps. we seem to have an inherent way of subconsciously feeling self judgment when question like that are asked. title: Total relaxation

I still use calm because the meditations are valuable to me, but Tamara‚Äôs voice is absolutely piercing.

title: LOVE

title: Meditation
review: This app helped me focus on the best and the worst that could happen it helped me think mentally and be happy relaxed and enjoy my sleep better when I was without this app I was having a hard time sleeping and focusing and this app helped me focus and sleep I love this and hopefully this app helps you to like it helped me

title: Why I like ‚ÄúCalm‚Äù
review: I have had calm for quite awhile now. I had no idea that there were so many options you can choose from on this app. It is a mini self help for us to use at anytime any day that is convenient to me. That is priceless for me. The range of things you can use is the best.

title: There isn‚Äôt enough stars

title: Musical Meletonin
review: ! This Calm thing is no joke. My son usually takes 30 min at the least, 45 min on average to fall asleep!!!! Last two nights he doses off in 5 min. And 2-3 min he's asleep. At 10 min he's OUT! Out!!!! Omggggg! üò≥ holy moses! This is magical. Totally worth every penny. Plus you can set a reminder to get ready for bed. Works like a charm.

review:
I‚Äôm very happy with Calm‚Äôs music service, and subscribed for a year. HOWEVER, an unexpected problem cropped up when signing in to AppleTV because of my encrypted email address which,  unfortunately, I let them do to it on initial sign-up.

So now I‚Äôm requesting they decrypt my email, and I‚Äôm waiting to hear back from them on this topic. 

Naturally I will bump up my review once this is cleared up.

title: Worth the Cost
review: They say to always invest in yourself... that is especially true of your mental health. Don‚Äôt hesitate when you see the price because if you use this app regularly, it will more than pay for itself. Just a few days of guided mediation has worked wonders for me.

title: Some nice meditations
review: My husband and I love the calm app BUT just for the soundscapes, some of the music, and some of the sleep stories.... almost all of the meditations are guided by one or two women, Tamara & Tara. We can‚Äôt get past Tamara‚Äôs voice and do not find it peaceful or soothing. We don‚Äôt listen to the daily calm meditation because it‚Äôs always her- ‚ÄúWelcome to the Daily Calm. I‚Äôm Tamara Levitt and today...‚Äù  We truly wish there was more variation in narrators.

title: Loving all the new music!
review: So many great additions to the app recently. I‚Äôm loving the new music releases and the daily Calms. This app helps me relax and unwind and I‚Äôm so grateful for it and the part it has played in my anti anxiety journey. Worth the money!!! Hate reading the reviews saying it‚Äôs overpriced...it‚Äôs premium, quality content that helps you relax and unwind

title: Beware subscription
review:
I signed up for 7 day trial subscription on July 17th . On July 23rd they automatically requested payment . This was day 6 of my trial . When I
Went to cancel I could not . Calm support is just a list of pre answered questions . Not even an email to ask for a refund or to stop payment going through . With misleading trials, I question the integrity of the app.

title: Grateful

I was having a pretty rough week. A person that I am building a relationship with have been distance, I miss my students, COVID-19 has kept me away from family and I am a newly divorcee. This app really helped me today. It reminded me to be grateful through it all. I completed Day 1 and is looking forward to Day 2. 

Gratefully,
BARB

title: Greatest sleep you will ever have
review: I fell asleep in less that 5 minutes, and have tons of options to story‚Äôs to constant sounds of a tropical beach or a rainy day. I love the story‚Äôs it lets me imagine a a beautiful place or thing and get to imagine myself in a nice place that helps you relax, then think about your depressing life.

title: Helps sooo much
review: I‚Äôve been stressed out lately due to school, work, and family and someone recommended me this app. It helped me forget everything and I am now happy. I was soo stressed I started stop talking to people and started developing Trust Issues. Now I‚Äôm starting to become a happy person with Trust IssuesüòÅ.

title: Finding Calm Amidst a COVID-19 Lockdown
review: I‚Äôll presently living in the U.S. epicenter of the COVID-19 pandemic in New York City. If you can imagine the usual bustling-hustling streets of NYC deserted, all shops closed, the rare person walking with their dog,wearing a mask as a reminder of the current battle being waged against an unseen foe. In the midst of this to find calm as sherpa to help navigate through this is truly a helpful tool.

title: The app really really works

My cousin has a very stressful job, often working 12 hr shifts 6 days a week. I sent him a link to a Calm ymeditation. He was very very thankful.

I just moved which is stressful. And my cable and Internet service keeps going down. Sometimes I am not always patient but Calm helps a lot.

Thank you

title: Premium
review: I don‚Äôt really see why anyone (who doesn‚Äôt want to spend money on calm noises/storytelling,) would get this app. Almost every single thing is locked, saying that I have to pay for premium to listen to those noises. I found, what, two open storytellings and one of just noises, the rest I had to pay for. As I do agree that the few things I can listen to are very relaxing, unless you want to pay for premium, I don‚Äôt recommend getting this app.

title: Cool app!
review: I like this app because it helps me with my ‚Äúanger issues‚Äù and it‚Äôs very relaxing. I try to follow along but my mind always wanders! I listen to Calm Kids (11-13) and I think that the narrators voice is perfect for the whole meditating mood. üòÇ At least it‚Äôs better than my scratchy voice lol. But yeah I recommend.

title: Calm works for me
review: I work a lot and even when I lie down for bed my mind still seems to be going. Calm relaxes my mind and thus relaxes my body. Now I can‚Äôt make it through a calm series completely because I‚Äôm sleep within the first few minutes. For me it‚Äôs a mental investment that‚Äôs so worth it.

title: Sleep Meditations
review: Loves the app initially. The sleep meditations are excellent. Those are why the app was recommended to me and why I recommended it to others. But unfortunately, the same sleep meditations are not as effective after listening to them over and over. Calm seems to have moved their focus elsewhere - lots of new other shiny toys, but just the same sleep meditations. Hoping they add new ones.

title: Love Calm! Even for the price
review: I only currently use calm for ambient noises to sleep. Specifically the soundscapes are excellent. Huge fan of ‚ÄúJasper Lake‚Äù and ‚ÄúCity Rain‚Äù. I hope one day I‚Äôll take advantage of more that calm has to offer. Despite my narrow uses I still thoroughly enjoy the product and the app. Highly recommend for ambient sleep noises.

title: Keep Calm and Pay Up
review: I loved Calm. There was enough there that was free to keep me engaged with the app. Lately everything seems to be behind a paywall. I can change my scenes and hear different sounds but how long before those get put behind a paywall? It seems the only thing I can do now is the daily meditation. I understand that you all need to make money but come on! I would deal with listening to ads if it would open up more content. Perhaps you should consider that as an option.

title: Mind-altering
review:
I‚Äôm not one to write reviews for apps, but Calm presents me daily with the opportunity to hone my focus, control my thoughts, and evolve into deeper ways of experiencing the present moment and world around me. 

I‚Äôve used the other apps, however, the variety and value contained in Calm is much greater for me. 

When I started out two months ago, I had a wild monkey mind. I still do on occasion and my practice isn‚Äôt always perfect. But with Calm‚Äôs guidance, I‚Äôm now sitting in 45-60 minute meditations with no problems.

I feel balanced, my extraneous thoughts are silenced, and I‚Äôm living a much more aware existence. I‚Äôm very grateful.

title: Stories, the solution for my bedtime anxiety
review: I‚Äôm one of those people who gets anxious at bedtime. No matter how sleepy I am, my mind wanders and I end up tossing and turning for hours. White noise is no help for that, but the wonderful stories with soothing voices have worked like a charm...they work so well I have yet to hear the ending or one!

title: Really good app
review: i love this app it helps me focus on big days like before school or before a test or before I go to sleep it helps me in the best and worst of times. I wish I could unlock premium but it‚Äôs a little two expensive for me but there are still some awesome free sounds story‚Äôs and encouraging speeches.

Other than that I would suggest it to everyone wanting a little relaxation!

I am paying for a subscription right now and I enjoy the app. My number one biggest problem is that Tamara Levitt narrates what feels like the majority of it and I feel bad saying this but I find her voice to be very irritating. So basically I avoid anything with her and she does *most* of the series :/ 

I hate myself for being this judgmental. Feels very unmindful but I just can‚Äôt help it.

title: Worth every penny

title: You should try this.

title: Spam Generator
review: App works OK..... but when you signup for the free trial, you get bombarded with Spam emails from various, questionable marketers. The following morning, this grew exponentially.  So either they sell the info to very questionable marketers or the info is immediately hacked. Either way, doesn‚Äôt speak well for security.  Time to delete.  Just an FYI for those that care.

Hope you have better luck...though you shouldn‚Äôt have to rely on luck to use a paid subscription üò¨‚òπÔ∏è

review: Why I love calm app it‚Äôs because it‚Äôs could help with overwhelm with over stress with everyday life this calm app could help others as well whatever others feel overworked or over stress with homework, schoolwork and even family and friendship problems this how calm app come in help with that kind of everyday life

title: Legendary for relaxation
review: I was recently diagnosed with panic disorder and have been having a hard time understanding what is happening and how to handle it. Therapist recommended this app for self care. I did one session on anxiety and it was LEGENDARY. It has helped me understand and grasp what my body is experiencing and how to handle these thoughts. It really works for me.

title: Just don‚Äôt
review: Very very rarely do I ever rate an app. There is a terrible problem with the marketing used for a lot of apps now, and this is one of them. You can, of course, get the app for free, but they lock all of their content behind a premium, and according to many of the one stars on here, the 7 day free premium trial automatically signs you up for it for $70. Do not fall into the trap of the 5 star ratings. Be sure to investigate if this is something you really want to invest in because this will be an investment.

title: Life changer!
review: I downloaded this app during the first few weeks of the COVID pandemic and I can honestly say that I‚Äôve used it almost every day since then. If you‚Äôre looking for different ways to bring more peace into your life, I‚Äôd strongly recommend adding this to your daily routine.

title: Voice choices
review:
I love the sleep stories and meditations, but I hate to say, Tamara Levits voice is not soothing or helpful when trying to sleep. Her voice is the female equivalent of Hannibal Lector. There are
Options for some meditations to select a narrator and I think this should be an option across the board. For the price you pay, I think it‚Äôs a reasonable request.

title: CALM Hope During Uncertain Timed
review: One month into the COVID pandemic I was experiencing fast heart rate and highly negative thoughts. I downloaded the one year subscription and started a daily meditation practice. I started with 30 days learn to meditate and now listen to the Daily Calm ‚Äî everyday fir a year.  This really helped me with serenity. Thank you!

title: Tamara‚Äôs Voice
review: The app works well and has a lot of variety, probably more than I really need. Tamara‚Äôs voice, however, is grating and unpleasant, even for the 10 minute Daily Calm. I‚Äôm ASMR, and there is a limited selection (voices only, which is perfect for me) of ASMR in the Calm app, so I know that‚Äôs on the Calm developers‚Äô radar screen.  Maybe Tamara loves the sound of  her own voice, but please try to offer us users more options.

title: Loved The Velveteen Rabbit
review:
My mom used to read this book to me many a night and each time she read it she would burst into tears. As a little boy I would always ask her what was wrong, the poignancy of the story going over my head.

It is a beautiful story but it is sad. Well, it is happy and sad.

title: Daily Trip?
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for a few months and like it a lot. Went through the full ‚Äú30 days‚Äù series and have been doing a Daily Calm or a Daily Trip almost every day. But what happened to the Daily Trips? They seem to be missing today, including those that I had marked as favorites. :(

title: Can‚Äôt do anything without paying
review: There are only less than a handful of meditations or anything that you can access, and they are all the beginning ones, meaning that calm has no use at all unless you pay. I wish it was more accessible and had more things you could do without paying or just pay less.

title: Almost perfect

title: Is it a good app?
review: I would not know, because even though I subscribed to premium and they deducted the amount from my account, I cannot access Calm premium! I tried deleting the app and turning off my phone, but it did not work.

title: Awsome
review: It felt amazing to put the phone down for just 10 mins and close your eyes and taking deep breath. I felt instant shift in my mood, so this app is a must especially living in this  hectic world where you don‚Äôt have time for yourself and a peace of mind . It‚Äôs a stressful world , don‚Äôt let it stress you out !!!!

title: Great app!
review: Meditation can be a hard habit to get into and it is so easy to feel as though you‚Äôre doing it wrong. These guided meditation are awesome, and this app is insanely easy to navigate. Even using the app is a calming experience and the falling rain that is always present is an added bonus!

title: Sleepiness takes over really quicküí§
review: I got the app because the month we have been selling your house has been super stressful and I wake up with my mind racing. I love love love the different options on this app to help get back to sleep. It helps having wireless earbuds.

This app offers nothing unless you‚Äôre willing to pay. I‚Äôm a therapist, who was looking into apps to assist both myself and clients, especially while things are difficult for everyone in a pandemic and found that this app seeks a ridiculous amount of money for sounds you can get from a sound machine for $20 or stories and meditations you can otherwise get versions of for free online. I, personally, like to invest in meditation/sleep assistance/self-care products. This is a racket. Really, don‚Äôt bother.

title: LOVe it for my at room!
review: I am an elementary art teacher. I teach 800 students! I've been using this app for about a year and I absolutely love it. The music is great to play when kids are creating artwork. I also love the stories and meditations. My 4 year olds requests the kids meditations before bed. Great app!!!!!

title: Why videos?!
review:
Looking at a smartphone screen or other smart device is proven to cause difficulty with sleeping, so, aside from the blatant commercialism, I am confused as to why Calm would start using videos for its sleep stories. 

That aside, I really enjoy the variety of stories and narrators available. More stories narrated by Stephen Fry would be incredible!

title: Wonderful App
review: Love this app! Best ever and helps me so much with my anxiety levels. If I feel overwhelmed or just need a mindful moment to meditate and breathe deeply, this is my go to solution and I‚Äôm so thankful, and greatly appreciate it! It‚Äôs a blessing. Like having a yoga instructor and music and my constant finger tips and it‚Äôs wonderful for my soul! ‚ô•Ô∏èüåà‚ù§Ô∏èü§ì love Chelsey Nicole Murphy Barrell

title: love it!
review: I downloaded this app for a sleep meditation and was not disappointed; It has helped me fall asleep every time i‚Äôve used it. I also love the music, it‚Äôs very relaxing and i‚Äôve loved listening to it to chill out or do something creative. I would definitely recommend.

title: Great App!
review: To be honest, I downloaded the app for the sole purpose of listening to Harry Styles read a bedtime story and that was magnificent. After that wonderful story, I decided to check out Calm‚Äôs other stories, music, and guided meditation which proved to be impeccable. I can confidently say my happiness has increased and my stress has decreased.

title: Unable to open ‚Äústories‚Äù
review: I love this app. It‚Äôs easy to use and intuitive. I often use the bedtime stories. There may have been an upgrade, it wants me to enable location. This is a sticking point for me, there is simply no reason for them to need this data. Grrrr

title: Calm n relaxed
review: I recommend this app. My lil big family loves this app. From my husband to my 3 boys. I have really bad anxiety n depression n I. Am say this meditation session have helped me so much. I love it. When I have anxiety attacks my husband turns on the calm app n puts it on anxiety n i can say it has helped so much. Thank you for the app.

title: Their sleep stories creep me out
review: I love all of the music and Day guided meditation. But there‚Äôs just something about the nighttime/sleep stories that creep me out. Even Matthew McConaughey‚Äôs was a little eerie. I can‚Äôt place my finger on it, but all of them freak me out. Thus, they have the opposite effect on me. I have learned to just listen to soundscapes in bed until I get sleepy instead.

title: Love the app, but take issues w the voice actors
review: Almost all of the voice actors are white, what‚Äôs with that? Also Tamara Levitt‚Äôs voice is like nails on a chalkboard to me. She narrates the majority of the meditations. I would love for this to change. Please, more meditations narrated by black and poc voices and less Tamara Levitt. She literally sounds like a Karen from Hell which does not make me feel peaceful at all.

title: Overwhelmingly Calming
review: It‚Äôs hard to express how much I use and love this app. I have severe depression, anxiety and stress, which I have to push thru everyday. But with ‚ÄúCalm‚Äù, I feel like I can escape and mindfully transport myself to wherever I desire, thru soothing music, and relaxation tips. Suddenly life doesn‚Äôt have to be so hard anymore.

title: A life line
review: COVID-19 has upended life as I knew it. Calm has been my daily life line to keep fear, panic, anxiety, and grief manageable. It‚Äôs what gets me to a state where I can do the work I have left well. Which is probably going to help me keep my job during and after this catastrophe. So here‚Äôs to calm!

title: I‚Äôm sad
review: Sadly, I do not have an account to calm, ... nor am I subscribed to calm. Calm has been very helpful to me, all the days that I‚Äôve had trouble sleeping I just go to calm, as always. The saddest thing is that I can only listen to one story and since I am not a subscriber..... I have very few options. - Unknown~

title: Makes a habit of meditation simple
review: A simple yet powerful tool for helping me to find clarity of mind amid rapid and complex changes. I have used it for the past year and a half. Great training, varied yet simplified choices so you open the app and start your mediation without any added busy-ness. Go for it!

title: This has been a wonderful tool
review:
This really has been a wonderful tool
for me. From Managing Stress to Sleep Stories. I have really learned a lot about Calm and how to bring it into my life. There are so many different things to use on the app. I am still enjoying exploring them all.

title: Please add Sleep Stories to Apple Watch!
review: I love this app. I have trouble sleeping and have listened to Sleep Stories and it works every time to calm my busy brain. I just wish I could access Sleep Stories from the Apple Warch since I usually plug my phone in far from my bed. This would really help! Thanks.

title: Love but don‚Äôt request
review: I love the app and all, but I had this app about a year ago and the musics were all free. I had a certain music that I like, When the Sun Sets by Michael Denny. I look at the app now, it‚Äôs not there. I‚Äôm considering deleting the app now. It‚Äôs a good app but I don‚Äôt request it, especially that it now had Calm Premium, which is too expensive.

title: Changed my life: Only have 1 Suggestion
review:
Hi,
I just wanted to say that this app changed my life. The content is amazing and great for beginners. I went ahead and purchased the full year in advance! I‚Äôve also recommended this to my brother and close friends because I strongly believe in it. 

The only thing I would ask is that you please add a playlist or custom library tab that you can save your favorite classes. Sometimes I forget where all of the courses are at and I have to search under each category. Other than that this app is perfect. 

Thank you. 

Rey

review: I really enjoy this app. It makes meditation easy and accessible anywhere and anytime. The app provides reminders and various meditations that suit all kinds of people. I just need to make a regular habit of it, which I‚Äôm missing out on as this is a fantastic app with so many resources.

review:
No words can describe how happy i am to of found this app. It can‚Äôt cure everything; but when i lay down for bed and put my headphones in, i forget about the stresses that i had that day.

To sleep with nothing on my mind is truly a blessing. Thank you

title: Calm
review: I started using the Calm app almost a year ago. I was feeling very anxious & stressed because of the pandemic as well as dealing with a negative experience in my life. Very misleading advertisement I have been hearing go around too about downloading the free app. Yeah it‚Äôs free to download but that is about it.

title: More variety in meditation in voices needed

Headspace offers 2-3 different voices for popular lessons, and there‚Äôs enough vocal variety there to have plenty to choose from.

title: I love this app!
review: I‚Äôm not one for buying subscriptions but this app brings me peace. From the meditations to the sleep stories. However I find myself listening to the music more than anything. Several gems are in this app including string version of Exhale by Sabrina Carpenter, Lo-Fi beats, and the most awesome Dreams playlist by Priscilla Ahn.

title: My subscription
review: I had only wanted to do the 7 day free trial and I get a $76 charge from my bank account today. The app is great but I am in no shape to have $76 taken out of my account right now. Especially if I am not using the app everyday. If I could please have my money back. Thanks.

title: Best app ever ü§©üòª
review: This is a great app and is definitely worth the money. It has so many great sleep stories and daily check ins too! I have this app since it ever came out and I can tell you that it only gets better! You have to get this and you should believe me!üíô

here‚Äôs my opinion:

review: Calm has allowed me to create a new normal every day where I am able to exercise my mind. It is now a way of life. Variety, quality and fun are three things top of mind that make Calm standout among others. I cannot start my day without spending time on Calm

title: The best app on the market

title: Very amazing app.

title: Wonderful Meditation App!
review: I love the Calm App and have been using it for almost a year. The daily meditations and the sleep stories are things I find most helpful. I‚Äôm sleeping better now than I have in a long time due to the Calm App. I highly recommend you check this out!

title: platform
review:
although I utilize and benefit from many features on the daily calm app., this is the second time I have had to re install the app. 
customer support is limited in this area and doesn‚Äôt give much explanation for this problem

title: Toddler saving grace
review: My 1 year old son has been hitting his terrible two‚Äôs a few weeks early. Tantrums and screaming all day, due to waking a few times at night lately. I downloaded this three days ago and he‚Äôs passed out every night since, sleeping all night. Amazing app!

title: Can‚Äôt yearly subscription
review: Hi. I was sent an offer through email about getting 40% the yearly sub in price, every time I tried, it says there was an error to try again. I really want to take advantage of that discount. If I try within the app, it quotes the original $70 price. üòï

title: It helps

title: My peace this AM
